story:
What is behind ÜBER und Walz?

I am an 18 years old boy of Chile. Everyday in went to different shopping centers in Santiago, I saw stores that sold products that we consume a lot in Chile, but, premium. Chocolates, Tee, Wines, everything that we eat in a massive way were sold in an exclusive way, made for people who were looking for that special taste that supermarket products can not give them. But, something was missing. One of the favorite liqueurs of chilean people, the beer. That is how we decided to create ÜBER und WALZ-Premium Beerhouse, a place where beer-lovers can find the perfect beer for them. In this store we will sell uncommon but Premium beers and other products from all over the world that will turn your experience while drinking a beer into something unforgettable.

ÜBER und WALZ is the response to a selected group of people in Chile that looks for Premium Beers and a Premium service. We plan to have an "everything for the client" system, where we will do whatever it takes to satisfy you in our store. To reach that goal we want to have different services, like a rewards system, home deliveries, special offers for frequent customers, supplies for special events or restaurants, among others.

All the information, products, services and contact would be in our website, that will also allow online payments.

If you help us, apart from the reward you will receive as soon as the store opens, you could be funding a future stores chain, but never forget, our main purpose is to make the client leave our store happy and that he wants to, so we need you to complete that objective.

 

What we need and what you get!

We need you. To open a store of this size in a zone where we can find people that can afford these beers, is not easy. We estimate that the total cost to open this store will be USD 60000. But we want you to trust us, so here we present you were are these 60000 thousand going:

1) We can´t work in a garage. To build this store in order to make it look as a first class shop, we will need approximately USD 35000.

2) A beer store needs beers. The total stock for our store will cost us 10 thousand dollars. 

3) Who is going to work? To hire, train and pay 4 employees monthly, we will need USD 5000.

4) Other expenses, like traveling to make deals with beer companies, paying a rent every month, buying uniforms for the employees, paper work and others, will cost 10 thousand more.

Of course, we won´t forget you if you support our dream. There are many fantastic rewards that we are able to offer you, from a simple ThankYou! Card to a ForeverMember Card that will give you 60% discount on your shops in the store or in internet, forever. In case that is to much beer for you we can give you an other option, like beers and other products that you will receive a soon as the store opens. What we are trying to say, is that we want you to be part of this project and not only someone who is giving money, because you are more than that for us.

Anyway, there is always a chance we do not reach our goal. In case the money we collect is too far from the USD 60000, you will get your money back!. Guaranteed.

 

Is this worth it?

Why is this project important for you? Fantastic question. The first impression you could receive is that this is a risky bet, because I am just an 18 years old boy from Chile, and you are right. I am a risky bet, but if this risky bet succeed, you could have helped me to start a store, that in the future could be worldwide, and you could have helped to reproduce that experience that we want to have in Chile, in the whole world. The best projects have started from someone unknown, do not forget Facebook. And every great project once started with someone that had a dream and someone who supported it.

And if you think deeply, this bet is not so risky. I am a very organized person that has been the leader of many projects, such as the import of about 150 Chinese products which included chargers, earphones and cases in Chile. I sold them all.

I also have been the President of the class twice, so I know how to administrate something important and specially when there is money involved.

But the most important for me is, that the say you receive your reward for supporting us, you can feel that somewhere in Chile, a dream came true and that you where part of it.

 

Risks and challenges.

Is everything in this project perfect? Of course not, it is impossible. 

Perhaps we are wrong, and we do not receive as much public as we thought. But we know that with our effort, we will be known in the whole city. But you can not just believe in my effort. You must see concrete actions. That is why we plan to have an advertising campaign, that will make us known, so we reduce the chance of failing.

Also, our first option is to be in a shopping center. Why? Because it brings much more public, than just being in a street. Most of the successful stores in Santiago are in shopping centers. That is the best way to have success.

In case you still unsecure, we have other plans, like free tasting outside the store, opening offers, and others.

That is our plan to avoid risks.

 

Other ways you can help us.
 

We understand that you are not always able to help with money. But you still can help us by sharing this campaign in your social networks! It would mean the world to us.

Trust in this little group of young entrepreneurs and help to make this idea real!

 

Thanks for reading what we propose.

story:
*** MAJOR UPDATE - Campaign Suspended ***

Thank you to everyone who jumped in early to support our crowdfunding campaign. We are humbled and thankful for your belief in us and our mission. The principal goal of this campaign was to allow you, our friends and colleagues, the opportunity to be part of a movement. We still feel that way today.

Early success is exciting but brings challenges. Our volunteer pilot community is exploding. Requests for community and agency agreements have already exceeded our 2017 projections. Furthermore, we are forging new partnerships within the drone industry daily, something we simply had not foreseen occurring until next year.

Several investors have realized the value of our mission. The number of qualified offers is both humbling and bittersweet. For me, it created an ethical quandary. After a weekend of careful consideration, I have concluded that it would be inappropriate to accept equity investors while simultaneously calling for contributions from crowd funders.

Hence, we are suspending our Indiegogo campaign effective today. Our team is unanimously in agreement that this most appropriate route to ensure the long-term success and viability of DART. While this decision is difficult, we can only be encouraged and energized by the response of both the drone and investor communities.

Refunds of donations made to our campaign are in progress. Even so, we will continue to honor all purchased perks despite the refunds. Everyone who participated in the campaign is now part of the DART family.

The current investment round closes December 31st, and we have held a portion of the equity round open for Friends of DART. Anyone interested in potentially participating in this round should reach out to me directly.

Tom Walker
Founder, DART

"It's not hard to make decisions when you know what your values are." - Roy E. Disney

  Our Mission

Our principal mission is simple. We collect, analyze and disseminate thousands of local, state and national alerts to the drone community. With our advanced platform, drone owners are notified immediately when an opportunity arises near them to provide aerial support. DART will support Law Enforcement, Local Emergency Response teams, and other community services to provide aerial coverage otherwise inaccessible due to lack of equipment or resources.  

  Our Story

I’m Tom Walker, Founder of DART.  After purchasing my first drone earlier this year, I quickly learned two things.  First, the drone community is much larger than I ever realized, and rapidly expanding: the FAA forecasts 1.9 million drones sold to hobbyists in 2016, rising to 4.3 million annual sales by 2020.

Second, I discovered a community passionate about doing more than capturing cool videos. We all realized we had a powerful tool at our disposal, but little opportunity to use it.

A few weeks later a major storm hit our area.  Thousands were without electricity, and the power company made it clear that a lack of resources and impassable roads would significantly extend the recovery time.

A handful of drone owners in my neighborhood, without knowledge of each other and any coordination, began aerial assessments of the damaged facilities, providing the high-resolution video back to the utility.  Interestingly, we were among the first to get power restored, days ahead of most other neighborhoods.  

That Sunday afternoon I texted John, our chief technology officer. John, I should point out, did not have a drone, and didn’t get power back for quite some time after I did {Insert winky face emoji here}! We began to brainstorm about how we could design a system to quickly organize volunteer drone owners to respond to similar incidents in the future.

Other team members quickly pitched in, and within hours we’d found no fewer than twenty news stories of amateur drone operators who had done much more than help restore electricity to a neighborhood – they had saved lives! We were inspired, and by Monday morning, DART was an official entity.

Over the next two weeks, I met with anyone who would talk to me, desperate for someone–anyone!–to tell me why this wouldn’t work. I met with the FAA, TSA, FEMA, Homeland Security, local authorities, state authorities, and federal officials from every agency you can think of… including a few I’d never heard of!

Seemingly overnight it went from me asking agencies “Could this make a difference? Are there reasons why it wouldn’t work?” to those same organizations making daily phone calls to my office, asking me how quickly DART would be operational.

Since then, our team has worked tirelessly, designing the core application that will push public alerts to the mobile applications our volunteers will use in the field.

To date, the project has been entirely self-funded. However, the hugely positive response we have received has meant that we have had to re-engineer our system to be much more robust. We’ve added improved geolocation capabilities and much more sophisticated event monitoring, evaluation, and notification. We have enhanced our focus on privacy and compliance and implemented training, exercise, and volunteer feedback channels.

We are very proud of what our team has accomplished so far, but these improvements come at a cost, and the enhanced system will require ongoing support fees higher than we anticipated.

We are passionately committed to launching this product. We believe that if we help save just one life or help find just one missing child, all our efforts will be worth it.

If you agree, we need your help.  

Every dollar we raise through this campaign will be used to speed up development, provide operational sustainability, and engage competent outside counsel to ensure we don’t make any mistakes. Finally, your support will enable us to reach out to the community and recruit new pilots who can help us save lives.

As pilots, both professional and amateur, we have a responsibility to help and serve our communities and those in need. We hope that you will join us in wholeheartedly pursuing our goals. Thank you for your support, and thank you to my entire team, without whom this would still be a dream.

Tom Walker  tom.walker@dartfleet.com

Why Now?

Rapid advancements in drone technology have made this possible, allowing consumers like you and me to own and pilot sophisticated unmanned aerial vehicles in unprecedented numbers.

Enabling users to pilot and capture photos, video, and observational data, the importance of this vehicle to the public has, perhaps, already surpassed that of the automobile. An uncaptured opportunity exists: to date, no communities exist to centralize these pilots and leverage their capabilities to assist local communities in times of need.   

Amber Alerts  -  Silver Alerts  -  Wanted Persons  - Missing Children

Disaster Assistance -  National Security - Fragile Population Protection

The Technology

What We Need

Our team has put our heart and soul into this project and will continue to do so.  There are no plans for full-time staff and all funds raised will be used solely for platform development, outside technical services, legal compliance support, marketing, ongoing administrative costs, and other expenses any new venture encounters.

Your financial assistance will accelerate implementation of the DART platform.  Furthermore, we have been asked, and sincerely want to expand DART services to more countries.  How many countries we will be able to support, and when, is largely dependent on your support.

While our team will continue to volunteer countless hours, we are seeking $85K to ensure DART is operationally funded through initial launch.  Once launched, we will be working aggressively on multiple contract and grant opportunities to support ongoing operations.  We have already identified those potential sources and are confident they will be secured quickly after launch.  Of course, funds raised beyond $85K will extend the available operational period and the number of countries we can support.

What If we don’t reach $85K?

This project is personal to us.  It’s now in our DNA.  We will successfully launch after the first of the year.  We believe in the mission.  We believe in the product.  We owe it to the pilots and communities whom we have promised delivery.  It may be more challenging, but we’ll get there.  Hopefully, with your help, it’s a moot point.

The Amazing DART Team

The Impact

In our video, we highlighted just a few stories of how truistic drone owners positively impacted a few lives.  There are certainly more.  But each of those had one thing in common, luck that a drone owner just “happened” to be nearby and aware.  We know that if thousands of like-minded pilots can be made aware of similar events, the impact to society will be miraculous.  It is that knowledge that drives our teams.  It is that knowledge that we hope will motivate you to help.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Tell your friends, post on Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, whatever you use.

Facebook: FlyWithDart

Twitter: @flywithdart

Instagram: @flywithdart

Please share with your drone enthusiast friends.  We are signing up pilots now and recruiting pilot beta testers for new platform evaluation.

https://www.flywithdart.com

story:
To see and hear and touch such an exotic automobile is beyond imagination.  From the deep-throated rumble of a 700 HP V-12 engine to the texture and aroma of the fine leather interior, there is no automotive experience like an exotic.  It is the legal way to "Excite Yourself"! 

To actually sit in or ride in such an exotic is, to most people, an inconceivable and unlikely opportunity.  That is, until AutoExotica makes such a “once-in-a-lifetime” experience possible.  Suddenly, the exotic fantasy is within reach…the dream becomes reality, because now...   

                  YOU CAN
       OWN A LAMBORGHINI!!



WELCOME TO THE WORLD OF

 AUTOEXOTICA, Ltd. 

"Excite Yourself"


A $400,000 Lamborghini Can Be Yours 

                 

This AutoExotica experience is not for everyone.  It is not for the timid, the boring, the placid, and those who chose to sit on the sidelines of life.  It is for the curious, the aggressive, the uninhibited, the exciting, the "players" who want to experience the unprecedented excitements life offers.   AutoExotica will truly be the "ride of a lifetime"!

The world of AutoExotica is an "Excite Yourself" fantasy-come-true realm in which the average individual is given an opportunity to do something most people would never otherwise have the opportunity to experience – own an exotic car, and personally experience the thrill of the world’s ultimate, most compelling, most admired and sought-after exotic automobiles.

These exotic automotive works-of-art are the stuff of dreams, ambitions, aspirations, and fantasies.  To touch, to see, to smell, to hear, to sense rocket-sled acceleration is an experience not often available to most people...until now.  Most people, in fact, are not even welcome in exotic auto dealerships, and are certainly not permitted to touch, sit in, ride in or test drive such cars.  That privilege has been restricted to the very few, the very select, the very rich and the very famous.  

This display of aloofness, arrogant snobbishness is precisely what most people experience at an exotic car dealership, and this arrogance served to germinate the very successful 1988 Autovia business model.



There are few experiences available to “normal” people so capable of creating excitement and the sense of power as acceleration in a 12-cylinder, 700 horsepower AWD Lamborghini.  For the auto enthusiast and the merely curious, for those of all ages, the sound of such a machine roaring to life pauses the heartbeat, and excites the brain.  Slipping into the leather seats, securing the seatbelt and preparing one’s mind in anticipation of the sensations about to occur…that is what AutoExotica is all about.  We sell rides in our Lamborghini exotics, and plan to add more in the future.  Ferrari, Aston Martin, Koningsegg...our customers will be surveyed as to what they want AutoExotica to add to our exotic stable.  It is this curiosity that AutoExotica seeks to offer… a special, one-in-a-lifetime moment for those who would otherwise not, anywhere else in the world, have such an available and easily affordable opportunity to excite themselves.

AutoExotica offers an experience that permits our customers to feel the emotional and physical exhilaration of an exotic automobile first hand, in an environment of pampered, personal attention previously available to only those elite, wealthy few who can afford the half-million dollar plus price tag on these extraordinary, rare automobiles.  

What We Need & What You Get

AutoExotica is seeking $800,000 to help subsidize its start up through purchase of business equipment, merchandise inventory, and initial operating capital in preparation for its planned May 2016 launch in Estes Park, Colorado, one of America's premier tourists destinations.  Located at the East entrance to Rocky Mountain National Park, this is where the concept proved so successful in 1988. The AutoExotica drive through some of America's most scenic regions on smooth winding mountain roads is exhilarating and forever memorable.

                                 

Through the phenomenon of crowd funding, you can become CONCEPTUAL OWNER of one of the most extraordinary automobiles on the planet...the car of your dreams and the dreams of millions of others.   If you are over 18, live anywhere in the contiguous USA or Canada, you can be owner of one of the most beautifully designed exotic cars in the world...a Lamborghini.  

Now, when you ask for a Lamborghini for Christmas or for your birthday, you can actually get the real thing...conceptual ownership of a real Lamborghini!  No more plastic, toy Lamborghini in your stocking...we are talking the real deal!  And, this is a extraordinary and unique gift for multiple occasions: Christmas, birthday, anniversary, Valentine's Day, Hanukkah, bar mitzvah, graduation...any occasion where something unique and different is indicated and would be truly appreciated. 

WARNING:  If you win the Great AutoExotica Give Away beware: Lamborghini ownership is not for the timid.  Be prepared to be the center of attention where ever you take your car. 


As a matter of fact, buy an ownership for ALL your friends, kids or grandchildren!  Talk about the ULTIMATE GIFT!  Imagine saying, "I got a Lamborghini for my birthday"!


The Great AutoExotica Give Away!

We at AutoExotica decided that once we have concluded commercial use of our Lamborghini, rather than trade in the vehicle for a replacement for our exotic "stable" inventory, we will give the cars away to one of our crowdfunding contributors as our rather extraordinary gift and "thank you" for supporting us at our inception.  

For every $100 contributed in the conceptual ownership, the purchaser receives one entry in the Great AutoExotica Give Away drawing to be help in 2018.  Your name will be placed in a random selection process for the opportunity to own free and clear title to this exotic automobile.  AutoExotic is giving away to one fortunate contributor FULL TITLE OWNERSHIP of this exotic automobile (certain taxes and licensing fees may apply and will be the responsibility of the winner).  Your conceptually owned exotic car could become your car with free and clear title, if your name is drawn.  The drawing will be held at a time and place to be determined by AutoExotica, but not more than two years from the Estes Park opening date.  The car will be delivered to the winner at AutoExotica's Estes Park location, and winner will be responsible to transport the car from that location. is only for the car to which crowd funding participants supported in the initial campaign. The car is offered to the Great AutoExotica Give Away for this purpose in "as is" condition and “where is” location.  Winner must be 18 years or older.  Of course, taxes may apply and the winner is responsible to pay all taxes, licensing and other government mandated fees. The winner is advised to consult their tax advisor in this regard, and make a decision to accept the vehicle based on such advice.  The Great AutoExotica Give Away is not intended to be a "lottery" or "raffle" and rules governing such should not apply, however, laws in your state of residence may apply.  If the this Indeigogo campaign does not reach its full goal of $800,000 no drawing or "give away" will occur.


What Your Lamborghini CONCEPTUAL OWNERSHIP Includes:


Silver Conceptual Ownership:  $100

Minimum 2000, No Upper Limit

This $232 value Includes:

  • Certificate of Proof of Conceptual Ownership [See description below]
  • 1/2 hour of cumulative ride time [see definition below] in your vehicle at the AutoExotica local at which it is routinely located,
  • Sweatshirt or Tee shirt (your choice) with an embroidered logo and image of your car.
  • Personal Photo Package – you alone with your car
  • One entry in the Great AutoExotica Give Away.


Gold Conceptual Ownership:  $300

Minimum 2000, No Upper Limit

This $535 value includes:

  • Certificate of Proof of Conceptual Ownership
  • 1.5 hours of cumulative ride time in your vehicle at the AutoExotica local at which it is routinely located, or within 50 miles of that location,
  • Sweatshirt or Tee shirt (your choice) with an embroidered logo and image of your car.
  • Personal Photo Package – you alone with your car.
  • 20% Discount on all AutoExotica merchandise and ride packages.
  • Three entries in the Great AutoExotica Give Away


Sapphire Conceptual Ownership $500

   Minimum 1000, No Upper Limit

This $885 value includes: 

  • Certificate of Proof of Conceptual Ownership
  • 2 hours of cumulative ride time in your vehicle at the AutoExotica local at which it is routinely located, or within 50 miles of that location,
  • Sweatshirt or Tee shirt (your choice) with an embroidered logo and image of your car,
  • 15 minutes of driving time in your exotic automobile under direct AutoExotica supervision and based on your being a licensed drive, over 18 years of age, with an acceptable driving record, and with payment of a deposit in an amount to be determined by AutoExotica, Ltd.
  • Personal Photo Package – you alone with your car
  • 20% Discount on all AutoExotica merchandise and ride packages.
  • One entry chance for the AutoExotica Lamborghini give Away.
  • Five entries in the Great AutoExotica Give Away.


Emerald Conceptual Ownership: $1,000            

Minimum 500, No Upper Limit

This $1,620 value includes:

  •  Certificate of Proof of Conceptual Ownership
  • 4 hours of cumulative ride time in your vehicle at the AutoExotica local at which it is routinely located, or within 50 miles of that location,
  • Dress shirt, Sweatshirt or Tee shirt (your choice) with an embroidered logo and image of your car,
  • 30 minutes of driving time in your exotic automobile under direct AutoExotica supervision and based on your being a licensed drive, over 18 years of age, with an acceptable driving record, and with payment of a deposit in an amount to be determined by AutoExotica, Ltd.
  • Personal Photo Package – you alone with your car.
  • 20% Discount on all AutoExotica merchandise and ride packages.
  • Two entry chances in the AutoExotica Lamborghini Give Away.
  • Ten entries in the Great AutoExotica Give Away. 


Diamond Conceptual Ownership: $2,500 

This Is The Ultimate Exotic Conceptual Ownership Experience

Minimum 500, No Upper Limit

This $3,970 value includes:

  • Certificate of Proof of Conceptual Ownership
  • 4 hours of cumulative ride time in your vehicle at the AutoExotica local at which it is routinely located, or within 100 miles of that location,
  • 2 Dress shirts, Sweatshirts or Tee shirts (your choice) with an embroidered logo and image of your car,
  • 30 minutes of personal driving time in your exotic automobile under direct AutoExotica supervision and based on your being a licensed drive, over 25 years of age, with an acceptable driving record, proof of auto insurance, and with payment of a deposit in an amount to be determined by AutoExotica, Ltd.
  • Personal Photo Package – you alone with your car,

                                      

  • Two nights lodging for two people (single room) at the world-famous, historic Stanley Hotel, inspiration for Stephen King’s novel and movie “The Shining”. The Stanley Hotel is an American historic landmark located in Estes Park, Colorado at the entrance to Rocky Mountain National Park.  Your AutoExotica personal driver will pick you up in your exotic car at Denver International Airport (or any acceptable location within a one hour radius of Estes Park, Colorado) accompanied by a limousine to transport your luggage and partner, to Estes Park and the historic Grand Heritage Stanley Hotel.
  • 20% Discount on all AutoExotica merchandise and ride packages.
  • Three entry chances in the AutoExotica Lamborghini Give Away
  • Twenty-five entries in Great AutoExotica Give Away.  

CONCEPTUAL OWNER means for this purpose you may claim ownership of the exotic car of your choice as one of multiple owners.  You will not have any legal responsibilities of ownership, financial or otherwise, and for obvious reasons will have no actual control or influence over the vehicle in any way.  You have no exposure to liability associated with the automobile, financial or otherwise. You will have use of your vehicle based on your specific contracted ownership agreement, with no use implied beyond that permitted in that agreement.  By payment of your ownership fee, you agree to the terms of the Conceptual Ownership Agreement, and AutoExotica Ltd. reserves the right to periodically and without prior notification, make changes to that agreement that will become legally binding.  AutoExotica Ltd. retains rights to full use and control of your conceptually-owned vehicle without first obtaining your permission, either individually or as a group of collective Conceptual owners.

Our History of Success

This is a business concept that has already been successfully tested and proven.  Conceived of and developed in 1988, and launched under the name Autovia, Ltd., the business sold rides in exotic cars, and offered associated merchandise, photo opportunities, and promotional opportunities to the general public. 

Autovia was able to establish and developed a relationship with Chrysler Motors Lamborghini Division, securing rights to use the then-new Lamborghini logo and badge  on retail items.  Autovia received support for this endeavor from the Chrysler Lamborghini division vice-president, upon learning of Autovia's business plan exclaimed, “What a great idea!”  Through the generosity and encouragement of Lamborghini, Autovia became the first retailer in the world to be given access and rights to the current Lamborghini logo.

Autovia created a first-of-its-kind poster in conjunction with and sanctioned by the Colorado Highway Patrol.  The poster, titled “Your Worst Nightmare,” was one of the top five most popular posters sold in the USA in 1988.

© 1988 Autovia, Ltd and Bert Bergland

 

Autovia, located in Estes Park, Colorado, an internationally renowned mountain resort and hometown for Rocky Mountain National Park, was selling an average of 40 rides a day to a wide ranging demographic group. The business proved so instantly successful that it became apparent within two weeks of opening it was necessary to purchase a third Lamborghini.

The attraction of these exotics and the appeal to such a wide demographics was truly remarkable.  What was originally expected to be a business concept appealing to males between ages 7 and 27, actually prove appealing to both genders and even to  adults in their 80s!  Customers quite literally drove thousands of miles for a Lamborghini Autovia experience.

The Autovia idea remains as viable and exciting a business prospect now as it was 25 years ago.  The excitement, the appeal, the interest, the curiosity and the thrill surrounding exotic cars has never subsided, and an entirely new generation of exotic auto enthusiasts is now on the scene.   In fact, after 27 years, people still remember with excitement their Lamborghini ride in Estes Park; it is truly the ride of a lifetime!

Become an integral and important part of creating this unique business, and make your own and others' dream come true.  Who knows, perhaps you'll be the one who eventually drives home the AutoExotica Lamborghini!  And, give this remarkable gift to someone you care about.

To see and hear and touch such an exotic automobile is
beyond imagination.  From the
deep-throated rumble of a 700 HP V-12 engine to the texture and aroma of the fine leather
interior, there is no automotive experience like an exotic.  It is the legal way to "Excite Yourself"!  

To actually sit in or ride in such an exotic
is, to most people, an inconceivable and unlikely opportunity.  That is, until AutoExotica makes such a
“once-in-a-lifetime” experience possible.  Suddenly, the exotic fantasy is within reach…the
dream becomes reality, because now...      


                  YOU CAN       OWN A LAMBORGHINI!!







WELCOME TO THE WORLD
OF AUTOEXOTICA, Ltd. 
"Excite Yourself"

A $400,000 Lamborghini Can Be Yours                  This AutoExotica experience is not for everyone.  It is not for the timid, the boring, the placid, and those who chose to sit on the sidelines of life.  It is for the curious, the aggressive, the uninhibited, the exciting, the "players" who want to experience the unprecedented excitements life offers.   AutoExotica will truly be the "ride of a lifetime"!
The
world of AutoExotica is an "Excite Yourself" fantasy-come-true realm in which the average
individual is given an opportunity to do something most people would never
otherwise have the opportunity to experience – own an exotic car, and personally
experience the thrill of the world’s ultimate, most compelling, most admired
and sought-after exotic automobiles.


These exotic automotive works-of-art
are the stuff of dreams, ambitions, aspirations, and fantasies.  To touch,
to see, to smell, to hear, to sense rocket-sled acceleration is an experience
not often available to most people...until now.  Most people, in fact, are
not even welcome in exotic auto dealerships, and are certainly not permitted to touch,
sit in, ride in or test drive such cars.  That privilege has been
restricted to the very few, the very select, the very rich and the very famous.  
This display of aloofness, arrogant snobbishness is precisely what most people experience at
an exotic car dealership, and this arrogance served to germinate the very successful 1988
Autovia business model.



There are few experiences available to “normal” people so capable of
creating excitement and the sense of power as acceleration in a 12-cylinder,
700 horsepower AWD Lamborghini.  For the auto enthusiast and the merely
curious, for those of all ages, the sound of such a machine roaring to life pauses the heartbeat, and
excites the brain.  Slipping into the leather seats, securing the seatbelt
and preparing one’s mind in anticipation of the sensations about to occur…that
is what AutoExotica is all about.  We sell rides in our Lamborghini exotics, and plan to add more in the future.  Ferrari, Aston Martin, Koningsegg...our customers will be surveyed as to what they want AutoExotica to add to our exotic stable.  It is this curiosity that AutoExotica
seeks to offer… a special, one-in-a-lifetime moment for those who would
otherwise not, anywhere else in the world, have such an available and easily
affordable opportunity to excite themselves.


AutoExotica offers an experience that permits our customers to feel the
emotional and physical exhilaration of an exotic automobile first
hand, in an environment of pampered, personal attention previously available to only those elite, wealthy few who can afford the half-million dollar plus price tag on these
extraordinary, rare automobiles.  
What We Need & What You Get
AutoExotica is seeking $800,000 to help subsidize its
start up through purchase of business equipment, merchandise inventory, and
initial operating capital in preparation for its planned May 2016 launch in
Estes Park, Colorado, one of America's premier tourists destinations.  Located at the East entrance to Rocky Mountain National Park, this
is where the concept proved so successful in 1988. The AutoExotica drive through some of America's
most scenic regions on smooth winding mountain roads
is exhilarating and forever memorable.







                                 

Through the phenomenon of crowd funding, you can become
CONCEPTUAL OWNER of one of the most extraordinary automobiles on the
planet...the car of your dreams and the dreams of millions of others.   If you are over 18, live anywhere in the contiguous USA or Canada, you can be owner
of one of the most beautifully designed exotic cars in the world...a Lamborghini.  
Now, when you ask for a Lamborghini for Christmas or for
your birthday, you can actually get the real thing...conceptual ownership of a real Lamborghini!  No more plastic, toy
Lamborghini in your stocking...we are talking the real deal!  And, this is
a extraordinary and unique gift for multiple occasions: Christmas, birthday, anniversary, Valentine's Day, Hanukkah,
bar mitzvah, graduation...any occasion where something unique and
different is indicated and would be truly appreciated. 

WARNING:  If you win the Great AutoExotica Give Away beware: Lamborghini ownership is not for the timid.  Be prepared to be the center of attention where ever you take your car. 

As a matter of fact, buy an ownership for ALL
your friends, kids or grandchildren!  Talk about the ULTIMATE GIFT!  Imagine saying, "I got a Lamborghini for my birthday"!

The Great AutoExotica
Give Away!

we have concluded commercial use of our Lamborghini, rather than trade
in the vehicle for a replacement for our exotic "stable" inventory,
we will give the cars away to one of our crowdfunding contributors as our

story:
Summary of Celata Aircraft's Crowd Funding Campaign

• Introduction
My name is Richard Celata and I am president of Celata Aircraft (formerly Celata Engineering). We have been machining aircraft parts since 1979, making parts for G.E. jet engines, Boeing, and McDonald Douglas Aircraft as well as N.A.S.A.’s land rover. We have also manufactured parts for several non-aerospace companies such as Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution’s A.L.V.I.N. submarine (the mechanical arm which retrieved items from the Titanic), Polaroid, Sylvania, Sturm & Ruger, and others.

• Our Campaign

While taking my Private Pilots training, I was required to do a cross-country flight. I was lucky enough to be able to talk my instructor into combining my certification flight with my need to deliver some parts to a customer in Texas. We flew a Cessna 172 from Dillon, Montana to Houston, Texas. Fourteen hours and 5 fuel stops later, we arrived. (Then we had to come back.)

I had already begun building a plane that had the same flight performance as the 172, but after that trip I realized that I needed something faster. Here is where my search for a 240+ MPH DIY Home Build aircraft started. The only DIY Home Build aircraft with the characteristics I required was a “plans-only build”. This means you get a set of plans and you make every part, and 4,000+ hours later you have a 240 MPH plane.

Our goal is to build Ready To Fly (RTF) aircraft and kits at a reasonable price for the General Aviation market by developing new and faster manufacturing processes. These processes will include improving traditional construction methods, as well as utilizing new materials, manufacturing and construction methods.

                                                      Rib Jigs for the GP-4.

This “plans-only build” aircraft we decided on is a superb airframe, designed in the mid 80’s, and listed as a 4,000-hour build (average is actually 6,500 hours) is unacceptable to us, and to most builders. The fact is, most "Home-builders" start their build as "empty nesters" (between 50 and 60 years of age) and with an average build time of 6,500 hours, that translates into 10 to 13 years. There is a high number of builders that pass away, or can no long pass their medical to fly before finishing the aircraft.

                     Their unfinished airframe is sold for pennies on the dollar.

              

  

We have set out to solve this problem. After purchasing the GP-4 plans and studying them for a month, I realized I could manufacture a kit; faster, cheaper, and a higher quality than could be built from the original plans.

 We also intend to build a 60 size Radio Controlled model of the GP-4.

This is our goal: to make kits that can be built by the home builder in about 1,000 hours (in 500 hours at our shop). We have already achieved building the tail feathers in a weekend from the kit we will sell.

Further, our kits will be easy to assemble. If you have ever built a Radio Controlled model airplane, you will be able to build our kit with complete confidence that you will have a safe FAA approved airframe. With our “Stage II” campaign goal, we will have a new 20,000 sq ft facility with a “Builder Assist” program. (You can receive a BA from Celata Aircraft.) Our BA program will allow the builder to come to our State-of-the-Art facility, and build their aircraft.

Our “Stage III” campaign will be R&D for new aircraft.

• What You as a Contributor Will Help Us Achieve.

With your help, we can fund the necessary tooling, CAD/CAM programming and purchase the remaining materials. Without your help, it will take years longer to achieve. We are a debt free company, we do not take interest bearing loans, and everything we own is paid for. Doing business in this manner makes capital purchases slower and much more time-consuming, but also makes our company stable.

• What We Need and What You Get

We are looking to raise; Stage I: $500,000, up to 2 million total for Stage II and Stage III. This is broken down into CF fees 5%, Taxes 33+%, and 62% for labor, materials, and perks.

• If We Do Not Reach our Funding Goal.

Where do the funds go if we are not fully funded? Back to you, of course. We will not start this project unless we are fully funded. We have no desire to start and not finish; we like to succeed, not fail. This is also why we decided back in the early 1980s to maintain our debt free status.

•The Impact of Our Campaign

Stage one: $500,000: Our first Ready-To-Fly plane will be dedicated to my brother, Stephen Celata, who passed away in June 2015 while waiting for a heart transplant. Stephen (AKA: Andy Blacksmith) was a beloved morning radio personality on WHEB 100.3 in New Hampshire.

                               

                                                     Andy in his prime.

                  Telling listeners about how important it is to be an organ donor.

                                                         Waiting for a heart.

Once we are fully funded (Stage I) we will produce the first Ready-To-Fly aircraft (the Blacksmith.) Then we will tour New England, ending in Oshkosh, Wisconsin, and raffle off the “Blacksmith” with all the proceeds going to “Donate Life New England” to help promote organ donation.

                                                  Donate Life New England

Our goal with the "Blacksmith" is to bring awareness of how many people die for lack of donors.

Stage two: and additional $1,000,000: We will build a new 20,000 sq ft facility at the airport (site already secured) where we can build, assemble, paint, employ up to 25 full time workers, and start our Builders Assist Program.

                                                  Our conceptual buildings.

Stage three: $500,000: Take our GP-4 into the age of Carbon Fiber (CF) construction, and R&D for new aircraft. CF is stronger, lighter, and requires less maintenance (corrosion). Our total goal for all three stages is $2 million.

If we reach our $2 million goal, we will make a donation on every sale to Donate Life New England.

We are already manufacturing GP-4 parts for those who have started their GP-4 “plans-only build”, and would like to bring this to the next step, kits and RTFs.

                                                             GP-4 Ruder hinges

                                                         GP-4 Engine mount.

We have always done “design engineering from prototype to final assembly”. I hold one U.S. patent. We have successfully designed, manufactured, and marketed the world famous B52 fly Cutter, a cutting tool for machine shops. Harley Davidson requires all their repair shops to have B52 fly cutters for machining their engine blocks and cylinder heads. Also, the Big 3 (Chevy, Ford, Chrysler) all use our B52s.

                                         


                                                          The B52 Fly Cutters.

• Risks & Challenges

One of the challenges we have already overcome was that the “build-only” plans were incomplete. We have spent 3 months, painstakingly converting the 1980s hand drawn blue prints to CAD, which pointed out where all the parts did not fit exactly. Thus we were able to avoid making the parts wrong, and then having to make them over to fit properly (one of the reasons for the 6,500 hour build time), saving time and money. Like any “machine building” process, there will be revisions, and we have accounted for this.


The designer of the aircraft is also working with us if the need arises.

With 36 years of experience in not only parts manufacturing, but full machine design, manufacturing, and assembly (over half of which having been machines where failure could result in personal injury or death), we fully understand our responsibility to provide a safe and superior aircraft.

            

                                                


• Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute, please pass along word of our campaign, especially if you live in the New England area and, if you are a WHEB: The Morning Buzz listener, pass the word to other listeners. Pass us along on your social media and use the Indiegogo “Share Tools”.

• Perk Images.

                          

                                           Barnstormer Leather Jacket

Just one of Ron Cole's works of art. The GP-4 art work will be of this quality.

                                                       Our 11oz Coffee Mug
story_txt:
Summary of Celata Aircraft's Crowd Funding Campaign
• Introduction
My name is Richard Celata and I am president of Celata Aircraft (formerly
Celata Engineering). We have been machining aircraft parts since 1979, making
parts for G.E. jet engines, Boeing, and McDonald Douglas Aircraft as well as
N.A.S.A.’s land rover. We have also manufactured parts for several
non-aerospace companies such as Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution’s
A.L.V.I.N. submarine (the mechanical arm which retrieved items from the Titanic), Polaroid, Sylvania, Sturm & Ruger, and others.• Our CampaignWhile taking my Private Pilots training, I was required to do a cross-country
flight. I was lucky enough to be able to talk my instructor into combining my
certification flight with my need to deliver some parts to a customer in Texas.
We flew a Cessna 172 from Dillon, Montana to Houston, Texas. Fourteen hours and
5 fuel stops later, we arrived. (Then we had to come back.) I had already begun
building a plane that had the same flight performance as the 172, but after
that trip I realized that I needed something faster. Here is where my search
for a 240+ MPH DIY Home Build aircraft started. The only DIY Home Build
aircraft with the characteristics I required was a “plans-only build”. This
means you get a set of plans and you make every part, and 4,000+ hours later
you have a 240 MPH plane.Our goal is to build Ready To Fly (RTF) aircraft and kits at a reasonable
price for the General Aviation market by developing new and faster
manufacturing processes. These processes will include improving traditional
construction methods, as well as utilizing new materials, manufacturing and
construction methods.                                                      Rib Jigs for the GP-4.
This “plans-only build” aircraft we decided on is a superb airframe,
designed in the mid 80’s, and listed as a 4,000-hour build (average is actually 6,500 hours) is
unacceptable to us, and to most builders. The fact is, most "Home-builders" start their build as "empty nesters" (between 50 and 60 years of age) and with an average build time of 6,500 hours, that translates into 10 to 13 years. There is a high number of builders that pass away, or can no long pass their medical to fly before finishing the aircraft.                      Their unfinished airframe is sold for pennies on the dollar.                    We have set out to solve this problem. After purchasing the GP-4 plans and studying
them for a month, I realized I could manufacture a kit; faster, cheaper, and a
higher quality than could be built from the original plans. We also intend to build a 60 size Radio Controlled model of the GP-4.
This is our goal: to make kits that can be built by the home builder in
about 1,000 hours (in 500 hours at our shop). We have already achieved
building the tail feathers in a weekend from the kit we will sell. 
Further, our kits will be easy to assemble. If you have ever built a Radio
Controlled model airplane, you will be able to build our kit with complete confidence
that you will have a safe FAA approved airframe. With our “Stage II” campaign
goal, we will have a new 20,000 sq ft facility with a “Builder Assist” program.
(You can receive a BA from Celata Aircraft.) Our BA program will allow the
builder to come to our State-of-the-Art facility, and build their aircraft.
Our “Stage III” campaign will be R&D for new aircraft.
• What You as a Contributor Will Help Us Achieve.
With your help, we can fund the necessary tooling, CAD/CAM programming and
purchase the remaining materials. Without your help, it will take years longer
to achieve. We are a debt free company, we do not take interest bearing loans,
and everything we own is paid for. Doing business in this manner makes capital
purchases slower and much more time-consuming, but also makes our company
stable.
• What We Need and What You Get
We are looking to raise; Stage I: $500,000, up to 2 million total for Stage II
and Stage III. This is broken down into CF fees 5%, Taxes 33+%, and 62% for
labor, materials, and perks.• If We Do Not Reach our Funding Goal.
Where do the funds go if we are not fully funded? Back to you, of course. We
will not start this project unless we are fully funded. We have no desire to
start and not finish; we like to succeed, not fail. This is also why we decided
back in the early 1980s to maintain our debt free status.
•The Impact of Our Campaign 
Stage one: $500,000: Our first Ready-To-Fly plane will be dedicated to my brother,
Stephen Celata, who passed away in June 2015 while waiting for a heart
transplant. Stephen (AKA: Andy Blacksmith) was a beloved morning radio
personality on WHEB 100.3 in New Hampshire.                                                                                     Andy in his prime.                  Telling listeners about how important it is to be an organ donor.                                                         Waiting for a heart.
Once we are fully funded (Stage I) we will produce the first Ready-To-Fly aircraft
(the Blacksmith.) Then we will tour New England, ending in Oshkosh, Wisconsin,
and raffle off the “Blacksmith” with all the proceeds going to “Donate Life New
England” to help promote organ donation.                                                  Donate Life New England
Our goal with the "Blacksmith" is to bring awareness of how many people die for lack of donors. Stage two: and additional $1,000,000: We will build a new 20,000 sq ft facility at the
airport (site already secured) where we can build, assemble, paint, employ
up to 25 full time workers, and start our Builders Assist Program.                                                  Our conceptual buildings.
Stage three: $500,000: Take our GP-4 into the age of Carbon Fiber (CF)
construction, and R&D for new aircraft. CF is stronger, lighter, and requires less
maintenance (corrosion). Our total goal for all three stages is $2
million.
If we reach our $2 million goal, we will make a donation on every sale to Donate Life New England.
We are already manufacturing GP-4 parts for those who have started their GP-4
“plans-only build”, and would like to bring this to the next step, kits and RTFs.                                                              GP-4 Ruder hinges                                                          GP-4 Engine mount.
We have always done “design engineering from prototype to final assembly”. I
hold one U.S. patent. We have successfully designed, manufactured, and marketed
the world famous B52 fly Cutter, a cutting tool for machine shops. Harley
Davidson requires all their repair shops to have B52 fly cutters for machining
their engine blocks and cylinder heads. Also, the Big 3 (Chevy, Ford, Chrysler)
all use our B52s.                                                                                                    The B52 Fly Cutters.
• Risks & Challenges
One of the challenges we have already overcome was that the
“build-only” plans were incomplete. We have spent 3 months, painstakingly converting the 1980s hand drawn blue prints to
CAD, which pointed out where all the parts did not fit exactly. Thus we were
able to avoid making the parts wrong, and then having to make them over to fit
properly (one of the reasons for the 6,500 hour build time), saving time and money. Like any “machine building” process, there
will be revisions, and we have accounted for this. 
 The designer of the aircraft is also working with us if the need arises.
With 36 years of experience in not only parts manufacturing, but full machine
design, manufacturing, and assembly (over half of which having been machines
where failure could result in personal injury or death), we fully understand
our responsibility to provide a safe and superior aircraft.                                                              

• Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute, please pass along word of our campaign,
especially if you live in the New England area and, if you are a WHEB:
The Morning Buzz listener, pass the word to other listeners. Pass us along on your
social media and use the Indiegogo “Share Tools”.• Perk Images.                                                                      Barnstormer Leather JacketJust one of Ron Cole's works of art. The GP-4 art work will be of this quality.                                                       Our 11oz Coffee Mug

story:
Thomas Edison Failed 1000 Times. Will You?

Have you ever thought about the fact that all of the materials necessary to create a light bulb were here upon our earth since the beginning and yet electric lights have been a luxury mankind has only enjoyed for the past 136 years? Thomas Edison created the first light bulb that was mass produced but there were several others trying to invent lightbulbs at the time. Edison just did it better.

Similar to light bulbs, the resources necessary to help human beings achieve optimal health are here upon our earth as we speak. Companies all around the world are trying to develop products that help people overcome health problems. The problem is, when it comes to chronic disease, pharmaceutical companies today are like the oil lamps of the past. They are inefficient. It is estimated that 100,000 Americans die each year from taking their prescription drugs just as the doctor ordered.

It is time you stop using oil lamps and start using light bulbs.

Have you ever struggled to lose stubborn belly fat?

Here at New World Supplements we provide organic, plant sourced, heavily researched, highly effective supplements to the world that help people take control of their health. Our products come bundled with the most recent research and information on current diseases.

Have you ever struggled to lose stubborn belly fat? Or been confused about why you were always so exhausted? It's not awesome right?

Not only will you gain more knowledge about current health problems than you would have ever gotten from a traditional doctors visit; you will also learn about steps you can take right away to start making your situation better. I know how it feels to be confused as the doctor issues what feels like a life sentence to pain and suffering. I have been in that situation before and I have some good news, you can feel better.

When you detox the right way with a product that actually works you will realize that…

  1. Hard to lose belly fat starts to disappear (some have lost over 8 pounds in just two weeks detoxing the right way)

  2. Your skin becomes bright and smooth again.

  3. Your mind no longer feels cloudy

  4. You can eat without feeling bloated and can go to the bathroom without pain.

Feeling skeptical? That’s ok, you have a right to be. Let’s take a look at the hard science that supports the first product we will be launching.

Note: Besides the detox powder, all other products will be delivered in digital format in order to save trees.

Have You Been A Victim Of Toxic Supplements?

With 80,000 new chemicals introduced into the world each year the question becomes less about whether or not you should detox and more about how you need to go about detoxing. Environmental toxins have become a global problem with countries like China Leading the way in overall toxicity and the sickness and pain that comes along with it (more on this later).

The question “how do I detox?” is a hard question to answer. In fact, if you search “detox Supplements” Google comes up with over 2.5 million results.  The sad thing about the vast majority of these supplements is that they are not built on sound science. Supplement company owners often cut corners in order to increase profits and cut costs. Contaminated Chinese herbs and toxic “detox” supplements are not uncommon, ironic right? By producing cheap ineffective products these companies are not only increasing the amount of confusion in the world in regards to health and supplementation but they are also using people’s emotions and illnesses against them, not cool.

Our Detox Box will contain what we (and many others) believe to be the world’s most effective detoxing ingredients. On top of that we also give you the most up to date info on how to completely detox your life. We show you what natural cleaners are best, we explain the difference between organic and non-organic food, we teach you about GMO’s, pesticides, water purification and so much more. You will notice a dramatic increase in your overall health and energy levels. This is, according to our knowledge and research, the healthiest, easiest, best-tasting, most effective detox ever created.  On top of all that it is certified Organic and packed in environmentally friendly packaging. By applying what you learn from your Detox Box you will feel significantly better and help clean up our contaminated yet beautiful world.

So, what makes this "Detox Powder" so powerful anyway?

Ingredient: 10 grams organic non-denatured whey protein.

What it will do for you: There are over 10,000 different proteins in your body. Protein is vital for your overall health. Many cleanses on the market today have you go without protein during your cleanse to increase detoxification. This idea is outdated and has been proven ineffective. In fact, your body needs various amino acids in order to help support healthy detoxification of the liver. Without protein your body can only complete about half of the detoxification process which leaves you feeling sick and allows toxins to float around in your blood and get reabsorbed.

Ingredient: 3 g MCT oil from organic coconuts

What it will do for you: MCT’s are a healthy form of fats that are processed differently in the body. Your body uses MCT’s to flow through your lymphatic system which is one of your body’s major detox pathways. Organic MCT’s from coconut oil are antiviral and help to support the detoxification of the lymph which is very important these days since most people have a backed up lymphatic system. MCT’s are also a preferred source of energy in the body and will help reteach your body to burn fat instead of store it.

Ingredient: Organic plant sourced vitamins and cofactors

What it will do for you: The vitamins in our Detox Box are incredible to say the least. They are 100% organic and come from water based extracts complete with all naturally occurring co-factors and co-nutrients. This means your body can better absorb our vitamins and put them to work. Most supplement companies get their synthetic vitamins from one of the worlds most polluted countries, China, and then they sell them for a high cost on the shelves of our health food stores. I don’t know about you but that just doesn’t seem right to me.

Ingredient: Organic Plant sourced Minerals

What it will do for you: Minerals benefit your body in many ways. You may notice improved brain health (mental clarity), a reduction in muscle pain, improved sexual health, healthier skin, nails, and hair, and an improved memory. Most of the mineral products on the market are processed with toxic processing aids which can negate many of the benefits of the mineral itself. We use organic, all natural processing aids that are actually good for you.

Ingredient: Nature’s most effective organic detox herbs

What it will do for you: Now that your body’s natural detox pathways are up and running at top speed we use the power of organic detoxification herbs to help send toxins through your elimination pathways. When you’re cleaner on the inside it shows on the outside. You’ll feel much more energetic!

Ingredient: Nature’s most effective anti-cancer and detox Fruits and Vegetables

What it will do for you: Cancer rates are skyrocketing in America. This is largely due to the fact that we don’t eat enough high quality, organic vegetables and fruits and we eat way too much sugar and chemically laden “frankenfood.”Many experts believe that over 95% of cancer can be avoided by changing how we live and eat. Our organic fruits and veggies help you take a step in the right direction.

As you may have noticed from the list above, detoxing is not always a simple process. Before our world became so contaminated, our bodies could easily keep up with the toxic exposure normal to everyday life. As our environment becomes increasingly toxic it becomes more and more important to help your body clean itself out in the most effective way possible.

Instead of forcing your body to detox by using harsh laxatives or crazy liver purging techniques we support your body’s natural biochemical detox pathways. Not only is our approach far more effective than the aforementioned techniques but it will leave you feeling exponentially more energetic, vibrant, and alive. You can expect to lose weight and feel 10 years younger.

In order for the body to truly detox itself it needs adequate amounts of conjugating substances. Most of these substances come from amino acids. To properly support this process vitamins and minerals must come with their accompanying cofactors. These cofactors are not part of the synthetic vitamins that make up the majority of dietary supplements found on the market today which is another reason why other supplements are far less effective and potentially dangerous.

Anyway, I could talk about supplements and health forever but let’s move on to what we need and what you get. If you have any questions that are not answered in the campaign please feel free to email me.

The Plan



We are starting out with a highly effective detox product but plan to expand our health solutions as we grow. Soon we will be offering natural support for weight loss, autoimmune disease, type 2 diabetes, high blood pressure, and stress/anxiety just to name a few. Our "boxes" address health issues from multiple angles. 

Our first product, The Detox Box, is on prototype number 5 and is finally ready for production. We have the formula and everything ready to go but we need $40,000 to produce the first batch. We will be using the other $10,000 to help orphans, build up our website, and put some money into projects to raise awareness for our company and our cause.

What is in it For You?

We are offering the Detox Box at 50% off to those who support our campaign! You're going to set New Years Resolutions and try and improve your health anyway, might as well be proactive and sign up with us so that you can lose weight and clean up your life with the masters and save a ton of money.

You Can Lose Weight, Help Orphans, And Save The World!

It is hard to fully describe the impact of the actions you choose to take this day. Imagine this, say you donate $5 and invite 5 friends. Maybe they all donate $5 and invite 5 friends and this trend continues. 

Maybe your small donation allows an orphan who otherwise wouldn't have gotten an education to go to school. What if we become known as the group of people who ended the rising rates of chronic disease and global toxicity?

Stats show that about every 2 seconds another orphan dies from lack of food and care. There are about 40,000 children who become orphaned each and every day. The best way to help these orphans is to support a for profit business that has a non-profit attitude. We will save orphans by providing them with food, clothing, and helping them gain an education. Education can save orphans from being sold into sex slavery by providing them with the skills necessary to take control of their lives We currently plan on donating 3% of profits to orphans and hope that we can increase that number as our business grows.


Risks & Challenges

You're right, improving the medical system, cleaning up the world, and saving orphans is risky business and there will be challenges. McDonald's wants to keep em eatin', Coke wants to keep em drinkin', and big pharma wants to keep em poppin' but we aren't afraid. We believe honesty, truth, and love will always prevail so long as we have the fortitude to keep pushing forward. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please remember to donate and share this with as many people as you can. Remember the more people who see our campaign, the more people we can help! Please post links to your social media accounts and tell your friends, take advantage of the Indiegogo share tools! 

Everyone could use a little extra good karma in their lives and trust us...donating and sharing this page brings very good karma.

Sign up at www.newworldsupplements.com and receive cool free info and future discounts.

story:
My husband and I have always wanted to grow our family through adoption. After I was diagnosed with endometriosis, it became our only option. Help us bring our first child, our little dumpling, home by buying copies of my cookbook Crazy Dumplings!

We have been living in China for nearly five years, all of which in preparation for bringing home a baby of our very own. We finally received the initial approval from our agency - CCAI in Shanghai - and are in the process of completing our dossier. By donating to our campaign, you will receive exclusive updates on our progress, including information too personal to share on my regular blog, Two Americans in China. 

About The Crazy Dumplings Cookbook:
Dumplings. Wontons. Jiaozi. This remarkably simple food is found throughout Asia and in Chinese restaurants and kitchens around the world, but have you ever filled a dumpling wrapper with chicken? Lobster? North American Plains Bison? Hardly anyone has! The Crazy Dumplings Cookbook features over 100 recipes with some of the craziest and most delicious dumpling filling recipes you will ever see. From Chicken Taquito Dumplings to Timey-Wimey Dumplings to a dumpling for your dog, Crazy Dumplings will show you all the crazy things you can stuff into a dumpling wrapper for an easy meal or snack.

The crazy dumpling dumplinger! This handy gadget will help you make perfectly filled and perfectly shaped dumplings every single time!
story_txt:
My husband and I have always wanted to grow our family through adoption. After I was diagnosed with endometriosis, it became our only option. Help us bring our first child, our little dumpling, home by buying copies of my cookbook Crazy Dumplings!We have been living in China for nearly five years, all of which in preparation for bringing home a baby of our very own. We finally received the initial approval from our agency - CCAI in Shanghai - and are in the process of completing our dossier. By donating to our campaign, you will receive exclusive updates on our progress, including information too personal to share on my regular blog, Two Americans in China. 

About The Crazy Dumplings Cookbook:Dumplings. Wontons. Jiaozi. This remarkably simple food is found throughout Asia and in Chinese restaurants and kitchens around the world, but have you ever filled a dumpling wrapper with chicken? Lobster? North American Plains Bison? Hardly anyone has! The Crazy Dumplings Cookbook features over 100 recipes with some of the craziest and most delicious dumpling filling recipes you will ever see. From Chicken Taquito Dumplings to Timey-Wimey Dumplings to a dumpling for your dog, Crazy Dumplings will show you all the crazy things you can stuff into a dumpling wrapper for an easy meal or snack.

The crazy dumpling dumplinger! This handy gadget will help you make perfectly filled and perfectly shaped dumplings every single time!

story:
Hydrogen has great potential as a fuel of future because it is an environmentally clean energy fuel and save us from the undesirable side effects of greenhouse gases.

Today we’ve completed our work and tested of metal-hydrogen battery «Clarity mini D» for charging gadgets. Everything is ready to manufacture it. 


There is no gaseous hydrogen within our battery. With the use of metal alloys battery has a high concentration of hydrogen which helps to provide a large capacity and has been absolutely safe for people. 



The body is made of lightweight aluminum alloy and decorated with artificial leather.

Package includes:

1 Battery «Clarity mini D»;

1 Sets of cartridges (20pcs);

1 watering pot;

1 cable to charge - if you made reference to our project.

The «Clarity mini D» battery can be charged from either electrical socket or regardless the power source. Except the energy storage, «Clarity mini D» also has an integrated generator to converse hydrogen into electricity. Through the use of cartridge and water, hydrogen turns into electrical energy which will charge your gadget .



Clarity mini has light weight, compact size and large capacity. Your gadget can be charged from any place any time. It will help you to always stay in touch with your family members and close ones.  It will only enhance your unforgettable travel experience. Clarity mini is a great gift idea. 



Such power elements can work within a few weeks without recharging!


You can connect multiple devices.


Get closer to your friends!


Best idea for the most active people!


Does not take up too much space!


A great gift idea!


 




Indiegogo is a very good indicator to study people’s opinion on a new product. We would like to hear what you think about Clarity mini.

We offer you more freedom and independence from electrical grids.

We believe that Clarity mini will help you to always stay in touch with your family members, close ones! It will only enhance your unforgettable travel experience.

We hope to get support from you! 


How to charge gadget with the help of battery.

Clarity mini will help you to charge any gadget. Just take a cord with USB connector and plug into battery. Then connect lightning connector to your gadget. Charging time depends on battery capacity and gadget, and generally takes the same amount of time as it lasts during charging from a power plug. 


2 ways to charge battery “Clarity mini D“.

The first charging method for “Clarity mini D“ from the power plug:

Connect the Lightning connector of the battery to your gadget charger and plug in. The full battery charge will take 12 hours. 




The second charging method for “Clarity mini D”, of power plug is not accessible:

1. Remove battery cover screw

2. Attach a watering pot to make the process of pouring water convenient

3. Pour regular water

4. Plunge the cartridge

5. Place back the cover screw

6. The charging process for "Clarity mini D" has begun

7. If necessary, it is possible to simultaneously charge your gadget. For this you need to connect the battery to your gadget through the cord. In this way, the electric power supply will be directed on gadget. After it is fully charged, energy will be stored on the "Clarity mini D" battery. 


How our batteries work.


Working principle of our batteries


A battery is an electrochemical device in which electrical energy is converted and stored in chemical form for storage.

Two electrodes (positive and negative, of the two chemically different materials) are separated proton exchange membrane.

The alloy (positive electrode) serves as a sponge, saturated hydrogen.

Proton exchange membrane (PEM) provide high power density and the advantages of low weight and volume compared to other types of battery’s.

This special membrane is porous to protons but not electrons.

The protons and electrons are separated by the action of a platinum catalyst in the electrodes.

The protons can diffuse directly through the membrane but the electrons have to make their way through an external circuit to reach the other side, providing power.


How the generator works within “Clarity mini D”

On words, the workings of a hydrogen fuel cell sound straightforward enough: An electrochemical reaction occurs between hydrogen and oxygen that converts chemical energy into electrical energy.

Here's what happens in the fuel cell: When hydrogen gas pumped from the fuel tanks arrives at the anode, which is made of platinum, the platinum catalyzes a reaction that ionizes the gas. Ionization breaks the hydrogen atom down into its positive ions (hydrogen protons) and negative ions (electrons). Both types of ions are naturally drawn to the cathode situated on the other side of the membrane, but only the protons can pass through the membrane (hence the name "proton-exchange"). The electrons are forced to go around the PEM, and along the way they are shunted through a circuit, generating the electricity that runs systems battery.

Using the two different routes, the hydrogen protons and the electrons quickly reach the cathode. While hydrogen is fed to the anode, oxygen is fed to the cathode, where a catalyst creates oxygen ions. The arriving hydrogen protons and electrons bond with these oxygen ions, creating the two "waste products" of the reaction—water vapor and heat. Some of the water vapor gets recycled for use in water tank. This cycle proceeds continuously as long while there is a decomposition of water.

A single hydrogen fuel cell delivers a low voltage. The more layers, the higher the voltage. Electrical current, meanwhile, has to do with surface area. The greater the surface area of the electrodes, the greater the current.



Risks and challenges

We have excellent engineering development capabilities and are serious about building great products that exceed expectations.

No project is without their risk and challenges but we try to do our absolute best to minimize them. We felt that we have done all the necessary preliminary work prior to coming to Indiegogo. That said, we identify the following as our risks and challenges:

MANUFACTURING: The product shown above is a fully functional prototype.

Unexpected situations may arise due to a supplier missing a deadline, for example, or technical problems of the supply chain for the mass production. 

To overcome these obstacles, we have developed a strong relationship with our manufacturer through having one of our own members of the Jimmy Chen engineering team working directly on-site coordinating the implementation of our design specifications. 

His extensive knowledge of manufacturing in China has allowed us to bypass many delays and has already fully prepared our manufacturer to begin tooling. 

As soon as we can reach our funding goal, tooling will commence.

FULFILLMENT: We will work closely with our shipping provider to ensure that all our backers receive their Clarity Mini D in a safe and timely manner.

We are committed to provide the best quality components, tooling, manufacture, and quality control.

We are dedicated to our project timeline and will keep you informed on the status of our progress on a regular basis via updates.
