story:
Grand Lancaster Adventure Kayak Tours

Hey everyone! We're Steph and Seth and we're so glad you stopped by to check out our IndieGoGo campaign "Grand Lancaster Adventure Kayak Tours".


What is it?

We've spent the last four years wandering around Lancaster County with our family and sharing what we find on Seth's blog at amishroadshow.com. One thing we've discovered is our favorite way to get out and explore. We love hopping on our kayaks and spending a few hours navigating the waterways around the area.


Ever since we've started sharing photos and videos out on the kayaks we received a ton of interest in joining us for the fun. So we started taking a look at what it would take to offer tours down the Conestoga River. It's didn't take us long to say "LETS DO THIS".

What will the tour be like? 

AWESOME!! No seriously, it's going to be a lot of fun. We've selected a portion of the Conestoga River that has easy access to many of the main routes coming into Lancaster. It's not far from a number of tourist attractions, as well as Downtown. Whether you're a local or a wanderer, this will be a nice ride. 


The section we've chosen comes out to about 3.5 miles. So until you add in the drive time and every it's ... yeah, it's a 3 hour tour. Not to worry though, this section is mild enough to keep you entertained while allowing a more diverse group of people be able to come along and join the fun.


Parts of the tour will be heavily wooded with large cliffs along the side. While other sections are much more open and offer spectacular countryside views you've probably never seen before. There will also be a variety animals like cows, horses, birds, turtles, ground hogs, and other wildlife.

view our 360 pano of the bridge here!!


Another advantage to this location is that we will be passing under two covered bridges, We'll pick you up at the endpoint and give you a ride to the where we'll begin. On the road we will be crossing over both covered bridges. I will also be pointing out a few favorite photos spots of mine. As the campaign rages on I will be sharing more info of what to expect on my blog at http://arslanc.com.

Why IndieGoGo?

To help see this plan through we need to pick up a few things like kayaks, paddles, life jackets, insurance, first aid supplies, and few other critical items. We are very excited to be able to reach out to our family, friends, and fans to get this project off the ground! Because you are willing to contribute to help us secure the equipment, we are willing to contribute our time to ensuring you have a great experience.


That's where you come in, when you sign up to contribute you get a perk in return. In this case we're pre-selling tickets to the tour itself! This seemed like a great way to fund the project rather than seeking out investors or applying for loans. We’re going grassroots crowdfunding DYI on this one, and proud of it!


The Perks

There are three perks to choose from 

  • The first perk is the 2015 Solo Tour. Since we’re already into the summer we have a limited number of seats available. As soon as the project is funded we will reach out to these contributors to book your tour. 
  • The second perk is the 2015/2016 Open Ticket. This means you get first selection for next year, or we can fit you in after the 2015 Solo Tour ticket holders book their tours.
  • The third option is for land lovers who support our goal and would like to contribute. You get the opportunity to impact a young person when we start our Jr. ExplorARS Program next year.

Due to the limited nature of the “2015 Solo Tour” you have to submit a separate contribution for each rider. It can be on the same Indiegog account, but it has to be individual contributions. Sorry for the inconvenience, it’ll be worth it ;)


It should also be noted that we currently have a weight restriction of 275 lbs, riders must be physically capable with a certain level of dexterity to participate safely, and the age limit is 16 with a parent or guardian. We would for everyone to enjoy the fun, but safety will always be a top priority for us. 


Regardless which perk you choose we have a lot of love for your support. All campaign contributors will be members of our Contributors Club and receive lifetime discounts on future tours. Your name will also go on our "Wall of Fame" on the site to show you've been a supporter from the beginning.


Potential Pitfalls

We've set this campaign at a fixed amount. So that means if we do not reach our funding goal no one pays. We could have went with flex funding, but we wanted to ensure that we would be able to cover the equipment, insurance, transportation, etc. So we're going to need your help to spread the word!

Another consideration is the weather. There are days when the Conestoga is less than desirable. The tours will be light rain or shine, but we'll be keeping an eye on the weather. In the evnet conditions aren't safe we will give you notice before your start time and get you set up with a rain date.

Other than that we have fully researched the plan and don't foresee any complications.

2016 and beyond ...

You've seen we are serious about getting started this year, BUT we are also planning ahead for next year. While we are mostly looking at weekends this year we are excited to offer much more opportunities to explore and discover moving forward.

Eventually we would like to add different routes. With over 60 miles of the Conestoga River snaking through Lancaster County there is a lot to see. We can go longer, or find spots a bit more challenging. We may even organise some day trips beyond the county line. Who knows? This is the beginning or an exciting adventure.

I have also felt very strongly about working with young people for a long time. That's why we're pre-selling sponsorships for Jr. ExplorARS. I would love the opportunity to work with local nonprofits and other groups to facilitate trips with a bit of education wrapped in a new experience. 

Our goal for the project is set at $8,000 to acquire the necessary equipment, but we can go beyond that. The more we make the more we put into the future of this project. 
So ...

LET'S DO THIS!!

We are super pumped about this project! We love that we have the opportunity to share this adventure with you, and we hope you will join us to make this dream a reality.

We're anxiously waiting to see you sign up and join us. I've said it hundreds of times in the last few months, but this is really going to be a blast!! We need your help to reach our goal so please remember to also hit that share button and invite your friends as well! You haven't seen Lancaster until you've paddled it yourself!

story:
The Incipient Stage:

Oxbow Roasters will become a small batch (100-150 lbs per week) hand crafted skillfully roasted coffee company located in Central Massachusetts. It will be a veteran owned and operated business and a member of Specialty Coffee Association. 

While stationed in Washington state, Michael Daniels, perspective owner of Oxbow Roasters, was volunteering at a horse ranch and was introduced to small batch roasting out of a cast iron dutch oven. A passion quickly sparked and curiosity for further knowledge began. Reading about the complexity of the art and science of coffee roasting Michael quickly realized he needed expert training followed by the opportunity to to perfect his roast for all to experience. 

With this funding Oxbow Roasters will become a reality, not just a dream. After participating in the education to become an intermediate level skill roaster, Oxbow Roasters will purchase a drum style automated roaster and began producing and perfecting their product.

The Growth Stage:

The money raised through this campaign will get the ball rolling for Oxbow Roasters. Oxbow is currently a dream that you can make a reality! Michael loves roasting in his dutch oven and making enough to share with others. Many factors get in the way of roasting via dutch oven including; weather, its has to be done outdoors due to the smoke produced; limited batch size, being able to continuously stir the beans for the most even roast possible is tedious even at the smallest of batches; consistency, the dutch oven offers the smallest of small batch roasts, never replicating the same roast twice. This campaign has 2 main goals:

1.) Learning from the best - Michael will attend classes towards a roasting certification. This will expand upon his new found passion, develop is artistic abilities and study the science of coffee. This will make him competitive and comparative to other small batch roasters.

2.) Purchase of a 1kg-3kg drum style roaster - With the purchase of the roaster Oxbow Roasters can set up shop in an already established location out of the elements of Central Massachusetts. The advanced roaster will allow for replication of roasts aiding in consistency. With a fine tuned roast more people can share the same great taste of what Oxbow has to offer.

With your kind donations comes great responsibility! (Previous statement kind of true, kind of false) With your donations comes varying amounts of coffee. How awesome is that? Why choose to give away coffee? Well simple, one, thats the product we are trying to get on the market; two, you are probably donating because you like coffee; three, Oxbow Roasters looks forward to any feed back on the product.

The Fully Developed Stage:

By mid- to late-summer of 2018 Oxbow Roasters should be in full swing producing 100-150 lbs of fresh roasted coffee per week. Fair Trade green coffee is what is to be purchased and roasted. The coffee will be packaged on site and ready for delivery within 3-5 days of initial purchase. I think I got ahead of myself here. Oxbow Roasters would like to sell additional coffee too you via online purchases! That's right! Continue to enjoy the product that you helped to start, share with friends and family our story. Don't worry though you're not the only customers that I have anxiously waiting, remember Michael has been sharing with his own friends and family who have been "chomping at the bit" for Michael (Oxbow Roasters) to produce more coffee. Oh, and one major detail, the whole being different from the rest! Shhhhh, bring it in close...there are not many micro roasters in the area to compete with, CHACHING!!!

The Decay Stage:

Horrible header title, but just goes with my theme. Oxbow Roasters doesn't plan to have a decay stage, but fully anticipates further growth. Mater of fact, Michael's 3-5 year goal with the assistance of Oxbow Roasters is to open a coffee house or two. With two locations in mind Northern Berkshire County and Central Worcester County. More to be offered on the coffee house if you'd like, but for now lets focus on Oxbow Roasters.

 

 

*Disclaimer

The header themes are based on the stages of fire development. Michael's full time job is a Firefighter / Paramedic. One of the best, rewarding jobs anyone could ask for. Though it can be stressful job Michael has found coffee roasting to be a stress reliever on his days off. Yes, Oxbow Roasters will be both Veteran and First Responder Owned and Operated.

After participating in the education to become an intermediate level skill roaster, Oxbow Roasters will purchase a drum style automated roaster and began producing and perfecting their product.The Growth Stage:The money raised through this campaign will get the ball rolling for Oxbow Roasters. Oxbow is currently a dream that you can make a reality! Michael loves roasting in his dutch oven and making enough to share with others. Many factors get in the way of roasting via dutch oven including; weather, its has to be done outdoors due to the smoke produced; limited batch size, being able to continuously stir the beans for the most even roast possible is tedious even at the smallest of batches; consistency, the dutch oven offers the smallest of small batch roasts, never replicating the same roast twice. This campaign has 2 main goals:1.) Learning from the best - Michael will attend classes towards a roasting certification. This will expand upon his new found passion, develop is artistic abilities and study the science of coffee. This will make him competitive and comparative to other small batch roasters.2.) Purchase of a 1kg-3kg drum style roaster - With the purchase of the roaster Oxbow Roasters can set up shop in an already established location out of the elements of Central Massachusetts. The advanced roaster will allow for replication of roasts aiding in consistency. With a fine tuned roast more people can share the same great taste of what Oxbow has to offer.With your kind donations comes great responsibility! (Previous statement kind of true, kind of false) With your donations comes varying amounts of coffee. How awesome is that? Why choose to give away coffee? Well simple, one, thats the product we are trying to get on the market; two, you are probably donating because you like coffee; three, Oxbow Roasters looks forward to any feed back on the product.The Fully Developed Stage:By mid- to late-summer of 2018 Oxbow Roasters should be in full swing producing 100-150 lbs of fresh roasted coffee per week. Fair Trade green coffee is what is to be purchased and roasted. The coffee will be packaged on site and ready for delivery within 3-5 days of initial purchase. I think I got ahead of myself here. Oxbow Roasters would like to sell additional coffee too you via online purchases! That's right! Continue to enjoy the product that you helped to start, share with friends and family our story. Don't worry though you're not the only customers that I have anxiously waiting, remember Michael has been sharing with his own friends and family who have been "chomping at the bit" for Michael (Oxbow Roasters) to produce more coffee. Oh, and one major detail, the whole being different from the rest! Shhhhh, bring it in close...there are not many micro roasters in the area to compete with, CHACHING!!!The Decay Stage:Horrible header title, but just goes with my theme. Oxbow Roasters doesn't plan to have a decay stage, but fully anticipates further growth. Mater of fact, Michael's 3-5 year goal with the assistance of Oxbow Roasters is to open a coffee house or two. With two locations in mind Northern Berkshire County and Central Worcester County. More to be offered on the coffee house if you'd like, but for now lets focus on Oxbow Roasters.  *DisclaimerThe header themes are based on the stages of fire development. Michael's full time job is a Firefighter / Paramedic. One of the best, rewarding jobs anyone could ask for. Though it can be stressful job Michael has found coffee roasting to be a stress reliever on his days off. Yes, Oxbow Roasters will be both Veteran and First Responder Owned and Operated.

story:
Breve reseña

Cómplices AC somo una Asociación de Civil sin fines de lucro que apoyamos a toda persona que vive con cáncer 

Nuestra parte medular de nuestro modelo de atención es acompañando al paciente y familiar en todas y cada una de las etapas  psicosociales de la enfermedad, minimizando el impacto que genera con información confiable que les permita un mejor manejo de la situación, planificar y tomar mejores decisiones. Siempre dando estrategias de cómo vivir dignamente la enfermedad.  

Parte de nuestra misión es también el ayudarles en la compra de medicamentos, estudios o algún material para cirugías cuando las personas son de escasos recursos.

Una de las campañas de procuración de fondos de donde se obtienen los recursos principalmente que apoyan a nuestros pacientes es "Recicla contra el cáncer"

Recicla contra el cáncer .- Movimiento sin fines de lucro que busca apoyar en sus tratamiento a pacientes de escasos recursos oncológicos y hematológicos a través de recursos obtenidos del reciclaje de material PET, taparroscas y aluminio, haciendo una doble cultura, la lucha vs el cáncer y beneficio a nuestro planeta 

Esta campaña ya protege al día de hoy a 73 Pacientes directos, 17 de ellos ya en remisión.

También se han realizado 2 transplantes de medula ósea en adultos de escasos recursos y acopiado mas de 229 toneladas de material reciclado 

Te invitamos a que seas un eslabón mas y juntos contar con recurso para comunicar acerca de nuestro campaña y de esta manera ayudar a mas y mas personas.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

El material se va a una empresa recicladora esta lo compra y hace el deposito a la cuenta fiscal de la asociación y de ahí en conjunto con los Hospitales Civiles de Guadalajara identificamos las necesidades para poder apoyar al pacientes con cualquier tipo de cáncer niños, jóvenes o adultos.


Porque Donar 

El financiamiento es necesario para campañas de comunicación, esto ayudará en llegar a más y más personas mediante medios impresos, espectaculares, revistas etc.. para el crecimiento del proyecto así como de prevención y detección oportuna contra el cáncer. 

Los fondos irán directamente a reforzar un proyecto que ya tiene mas de 3 años salvando vidas, siempre con la intención de ayudar a más personas día a día. 

Nuestra mayor recompensa es un reconocimiento por parte nuestra de esta gran labor de dar sin recibir nada a cambio sin embargo tenemos un reconocimiento a todas aquellas personas que donen la cantidad mayor de $100 dlls

El impacto

El proyecto genera una doble cultura ayudar a nuestro planeta y apoyar a pacientes que vive la enfermedad del cáncer, campaña que pueden involucrar a niños jóvenes y adultos ademas de generar una cultura del reciclaje

  • Este proyecto es un proyecto de éxito que está vigente siempre con la visión de que las personas no abandonen su tratamiento en caso de no contar con él recurso esconomico. 

Riesgos y desafíos

Los desafios son constantes, como nos contar con recursos suficientes para tu dar a pacientes desde el inicio de su tratamiento hasta el final de este.

Por ello la importancia de que este recurso ayude a la difusión del proyecto.

La solución a nuestros problemas definitivamente serán informando al donante del trabajo realizado en pro de la lucha vs el cáncer.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Si tu vives en otra localizada aun puedes apoyar de una forma sencilla solo difundiendo nuestra campaña y donando por este medio.

story:
IMPORTANT for USA contributors - please select the appropriate perk from the list for the shipping of your case/desk. You will notice they are divided in 3 categories by "shipping distance", so that you can choose the relevant one without paying extra for shipping.



Our Goal
Our dream is the creation of a hardware company where enthusiasts and modders can have their say, suggest changes and products, developing everything with the help and around the community, giving anyone the change to bring their idea to life.

A Company of Enthusiasts
Hydra was born from the desire of Ivan Marsilii to create enthusiast grade computer hardware shaped by enthusiasts themselves. In his vision, the best way to do this was to gather projects developed by the community, and unite them under one banner, Hydra.


A Collective Effort
Two heads are better than one, and a community is better than both. All of our products are developed with the invaluable help of community feedback, involving forums, groups and modders in every design step, creating a product that matches the needs and desires of the enthusiast crowd; they tell us what they desire, and we shape our products around that.

Attention to Detail
Being PC enthusiasts ourselves, we understand the inherit value of a well-made, easy to customize product that can be modded without frustration or useless complications.  All of our products undergo a rigorous design and prototyping phase, where we work out any and all bug we can find, to deliver you the best possible product. 

An Open Company
Since the very beginning, Hydra has accepted feedback and projects for the community, that’s how our first projects were born and developed; that is why we allow anyone to submit their ideas for how we should improve upon our products. We then evaluate the feasibility of the idea, run it by the community and if it meets success, we then start the implementation process


The Hydra Desk 
(feedback and ideas from Toms Hardware forums, Italian fb groups )

The Hydra Desk is a spacious Desk Case designed for those who want compromise-free building and modding capabilities. 
With it's 1.5mm thick, powered coated aluminum structure, 8mm thick tempered glass surface resting on rubber seal, space for 5 x 360mm radiators and an additional 480mm, along with dedicated cable management and routing space, the Hydra Desk aims to set a new standard in Deks Case design.





"Virus" mod by Yuri Gabrielli inside one of your final prototypes.

"Virus" mod by Yuri Gabrielli inside one of your final prototypes.


Quick Specs: 
- Dimensions (WxDxH): 1509 x 713 x 755
- Supports up to 5 x 360mm radiators + 1 x 480mm rad 
- Motherboard support from E-ATX to mini-ITX 
- Native support for up to 12 x 3.5" drives or 16 x 2.5" Drives 
- 2 ATX PSUs of any size 
- A total of 6 x 5.25" slots (2 double ones and 2 single ones) 
- 16mm green LED momentary power button included 
- CNC machined feet with antislide oring and adjustable height 
- Ample sitting space (h 615 x w 827 x d 710mm) 
- 8 mm thick tempered glass surface 
- Structure in 1.5mm thick, powder coated aluminum 
- Hollow leg structure for additional components/modding

NOTICE -  when choosing the Hydra Desk, please leave us a message on whether you want the standard feet or the extra-high ones (+5cm)

  

Defcon One

Designed with feedback from Tom's Hardware article comments, Italian fb groups, LinusTechTips Forum and Indiegogo feedback )

The Defcon One is an mATX case with a unique visual and thermal design that allows to place the GPUs on the opposite side of the motherboard and lets them always draw fresh air from outside.

This configuration allows for exceptional thermal performance for air cooled GPUs while allowing us to keep the frame compact, and allowing the user to place the case on either side of the monitor without loosing component visibility.


 Build inside a final prototype of one of our campaign backers

 Build inside a final prototype of one of our campaign backer.

Quick Specs:
- Dual vertically mounted GPU with external air-intake 
- 240mm radiator 
- 4 x 120mm fans
- mATX motherboard 
- ATX power supply up to 175mm
- 2  x 3.5” drives
- 2 x 2/5" drives 
- 2 x 3.0 USBs (included in the case) 
- CNC machined feet with anti-slide oring 
- 16mm universal button with green LED (Included) 
- Structure in 1.5mm aluminum 
- Plexiglass windows
- EMI and EMC shielded 16 x PCI-E 3.0 40cm  riser included (perk dependant)
- Extra long SLI cable (included)


Hydra Crystal 

This is an addition we made following community request on our fb page. 

This uniquely designed mATX case combines a simple design with a solid structure, with two visible sides covered by 4mm thick tempered glass. 
It can fit 2x240mm radiators, mATX motherboards and mounts the GPU vertically, allowing you to show off either your heatsink or waterblock. .

We will add pictures of the final prototype as the campaign progresses.



Tech Specs:
- Dual vertically mounted GPUs, 
- 2 x 240mm radiators with standard and slim fans 
- Dimensions 427.5mm x 301mm x 306mm (lenght, height width) 
- ATX power supply, - customizable storage in the back, 
- 2 x 3.0 USBs (included in the case) 
- CNC machined feet and supports 
- 16mm universal button with green LED 
- External structure in 3mm thick aluminum 
- Internal structure in 1.5mm aluminum and machined supports to avoid visible bolts. 
- 4mm thick tempered glass panels 
- Machined glass supports with anti-slide orings.


NR-01 

This is an addition we made following community request on out fb page. 

The NR-01 can be placed either vertically or horizontally (the feet can be switched around too) and provides the best compromise between a case and a test bench. 

Supporting motherboards from mini-ITX to full ATX, radiators up to 360mm, 2 x 5.25" bays and 4 HDDs or SSD, as well as any ATX power supply under the PSU shroud, the NR-01 supports a wide number of configurations, 

We will add pictures of the final prototype as the campaign progresses.



Tech Specs: 
- Support for 360mm radiators of any thickness
- up to 3 x120mm fans 
-Dimensions: 220 x 452 x 500mm
- Reverse ATX layout for GPU visibility 
- Dedicated cable management space 
- Support for any ATX PSU 
- 2 x3.0 USBs included 
- 16mm green LED momentary power button included 
- Customizable colored aluminum washers. 
- 2 x expansion 5.25" bays 
- CNC machined feet with antislide oring 



------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Perks Information

As you can see we have more than one version per perk. This is because we got many requests for unpainted versions that could be customized or people who wanted to use their own.

Same goes for the risers in the Defcon One and Hydra Crystal - you can either get our riser guaranteed by the manufacturer, or use your own.

We therefore made multiple versions of the perk, so be sure to check properly which one you are getting! 

IMPORTANT for USA contributors - please select the appropriate perk from the list for the shipping of your case/desk.You will notice they are divided in 3 categories by "shipping distance", so that you can choose the relevant one without paying extra for shipping.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Challanges

We have worked on the Hydra Desk and Defcon One for over a year, changing and adapting their features to community feedback to deliver you the best possible product. The Defcon One already passed a successful crowdfundign campaign on indiegogo, which changed it quite a bit and morphed it into what we have today.

As we worked on these projects, we also developed a number of concepts; two of these, the NR-01 and the Crystal made it to prototyping.

Based on popular demand, we've added them to the crowdfunding.

They are in the final prototype stages, and we'll finish the final version by the end of the campaign, so that we're ready to start on your perks.

Our team is comprised of industrial experts, mechanical engineering and design students, each operating in synergy to streamline manufacturing and delivery process as much as possible.


Who talked about us

(click on the image to see the news!)

story:
Short Summary

One of the definitions for “peace” is “a state of mutual harmony between people or groups, especially in personal relations.” If you’ve been watching the television screen or reading the headlines lately, our world is often anything but harmonious. Peace Hostel International is a hostel service whose mission is to create a hub where locals and international travelers can foster a deeper appreciation for different cultures, make the “Other” an ally, and boldly bring people into a state of lasting mutual harmony.

We are a small band of passionate Millennials who need your help in establishing an appropriate and effective location in the Chicagoland area so that our programs and events garner their intended effect. We want to show our international guests what it’s like to be a local in the Chicago community and most importantly, we will send locals abroad through scholarships intended to help spread the message of international peace and solidarity.

For a more in-depth look at how we seek to accomplish that, check out our business plan here.
 

What We Need & What You Get

I thank you so much for reading on. What I mean to say is that people are easily being caught by the fancy headliners and all the hype generated to gear them toward action. Since we’re trying to have a conversation here, let’s break down what we need to get started!

100% of the total dollars raised will be used to secure a physical location in the Chicagoland area for the hostel. This includes, but is not limited to, electrical and plumbing needs, kitchen appliances, bathroom accessories, washing and drying units, as well as office furnishings and supplies.

We’re a for profit organization with nonprofit goals and to honor our contributors, we are offering naming opportunities at certain levels. Anything from rooms to programs and perhaps even the building! Our unique perks include restaurant outings, guided city tours, and our most prized travel vouchers in which we’ll be taking individuals out both nationally and internationally to experience new cultures.

We are absolutely determined to take this mission out and will continue fighting for peace even if we are do not meet our goal. Please support us so that we can take this vision of a more peaceful society beyond anything any one of us can imagine.

The Impact

A hostel can be looked at by some as a cheaper alternative to a hotel. For many, however, it’s an experience! It’s a chance to meet new people and live viscerally in the hands of the community you’re visiting.

Our hostel assures that travelers get this experience by facilitating events within the hostel that bring people together and breaks the ice. We will also have a talented team of locals giving tours to our guests so that they can experience all that Chicago has to offer, especially in terms of our diverse and fine cuisine, music and cultural arts scene, and even our remarkable theatre community.

The program that warms my heart most and makes us a little bit different is our travel scholarships. We’ll be sending untraveled U.S. citizens out into the world with handpicked experienced travelers to help open the minds of our community. This will give ample opportunity for University students to explore, veterans to experience peace-driven tours, and locals to branch out and connect. For this, we need your help. The impact that this will make will send ripples across the sea of ignorance and transform our future as a global community.

Risks and Challenges

Our main risk is securing a physical location that can facilitate the kind of hostel service we’re running. We are also dedicated to keeping this business private. This is to assure we stay not profit-driven, but peace-driven.

Our main challenge is creating a proprietary security system which can keep both our citizens and visitors safe. The safety of our community members and citizens is our top priority.

An additional challenge is how to stay green and environmentally friendly in our operations.

We’re qualified to tackle these issues because our team includes persons with experience in real estate, public safety, marketing, travel industry, and small businesses. Fortunately, there is a strong love and enthusiasm backing this mission.

We are researching different building structures in terms of cost and application to our service. We’re fundraising with contributors who are interested in not just the bottom line, but the bottom of people’s hearts. And we’re getting familiar with different systems already in place at hostels around the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our campaign with others, but more importantly, please share our message of peace with your community members. Please get out and get to know the people of other ethnicities, cultural and religious backgrounds and connect with them. If we haven’t touched your heart or your wallet and you’ve stayed with us this far, please let us know why and how we can help in the comments section. And as always, get out and travel!
story_txt: Short SummaryOne of the definitions for “peace” is “a state of mutual harmony between people or groups, especially in personal relations.” If you’ve been watching the television screen or reading the headlines lately, our world is often anything but harmonious. Peace Hostel International is a hostel service whose mission is to create a hub where locals and international travelers can foster a deeper appreciation for different cultures, make the “Other” an ally, and boldly bring people into a state of lasting mutual harmony.We are a small band of passionate Millennials who need your help in establishing an appropriate and effective location in the Chicagoland area so that our programs and events garner their intended effect. We want to show our international guests what it’s like to be a local in the Chicago community and most importantly, we will send locals abroad through scholarships intended to help spread the message of international peace and solidarity.For a more in-depth look at how we seek to accomplish that, check out our business plan here.  What We Need & What You GetI thank you so much for reading on. What I mean to say is that people are easily being caught by the fancy headliners and all the hype generated to gear them toward action. Since we’re trying to have a conversation here, let’s break down what we need to get started!100% of the total dollars raised will be used to secure a physical location in the Chicagoland area for the hostel. This includes, but is not limited to, electrical and plumbing needs, kitchen appliances, bathroom accessories, washing and drying units, as well as office furnishings and supplies.We’re a for profit organization with nonprofit goals and to honor our contributors, we are offering naming opportunities at certain levels. Anything from rooms to programs and perhaps even the building! Our unique perks include restaurant outings, guided city tours, and our most prized travel vouchers in which we’ll be taking individuals out both nationally and internationally to experience new cultures.We are absolutely determined to take this mission out and will continue fighting for peace even if we are do not meet our goal. Please support us so that we can take this vision of a more peaceful society beyond anything any one of us can imagine.The ImpactA hostel can be looked at by some as a cheaper alternative to a hotel. For many, however, it’s an experience! It’s a chance to meet new people and live viscerally in the hands of the community you’re visiting.Our hostel assures that travelers get this experience by facilitating events within the hostel that bring people together and breaks the ice. We will also have a talented team of locals giving tours to our guests so that they can experience all that Chicago has to offer, especially in terms of our diverse and fine cuisine, music and cultural arts scene, and even our remarkable theatre community.The program that warms my heart most and makes us a little bit different is our travel scholarships. We’ll be sending untraveled U.S. citizens out into the world with handpicked experienced travelers to help open the minds of our community. This will give ample opportunity for University students to explore, veterans to experience peace-driven tours, and locals to branch out and connect. For this, we need your help. The impact that this will make will send ripples across the sea of ignorance and transform our future as a global community.Risks and ChallengesOur main risk is securing a physical location that can facilitate the kind of hostel service we’re running. We are also dedicated to keeping this business private. This is to assure we stay not profit-driven, but peace-driven.Our main challenge is creating a proprietary security system which can keep both our citizens and visitors safe. The safety of our community members and citizens is our top priority.An additional challenge is how to stay green and environmentally friendly in our operations.We’re qualified to tackle these issues because our team includes persons with experience in real estate, public safety, marketing, travel industry, and small businesses. Fortunately, there is a strong love and enthusiasm backing this mission.We are researching different building structures in terms of cost and application to our service. We’re fundraising with contributors who are interested in not just the bottom line, but the bottom of people’s hearts. And we’re getting familiar with different systems already in place at hostels around the world.Other Ways You Can HelpPlease share our campaign with others, but more importantly, please share our message of peace with your community members. Please get out and get to know the people of other ethnicities, cultural and religious backgrounds and connect with them. If we haven’t touched your heart or your wallet and you’ve stayed with us this far, please let us know why and how we can help in the comments section. And as always, get out and travel!

story:
Food has been a big challenge in taking care of the children rescued and provided with safety at Sikizana Rescue centre since 2005. We are lucky to get funding for a borehole with plenty of water. Now given further support we can start an Irrigation project and produce enough food for the children and give them nutritional diet.

The funding we are applying for will help us purchase drip lines, water tanks, piping and fencing.

story:
The Impact

The main reason to share it with you long before it can be make is each contributor that gets involved in this early stage will be able to enthusiastically and spiritedly in unity feel the experience with us, which is really what it’s all about, sharing the journey.

​The project is very specific: to recognize, develop and share our values, abilities, talents, gifts and passions to improve the quality of life for Civilization, humanities and all creatures.

By doing so, the changes that this project will bring have long-term benefit for our graceful associates, and for those we serve.

Here's how it goes. We work diligently on the purpose with passion and enthusiasm. This project is positively guided to serve humanity as our soul commands.

Media de-programming…

The path is clear to enlighten and educate human-kind to sing the song of their soul creatively and powerfully with the respect of humanity and all creations through new ‘Media’ and ‘spirited -Technology’.

Imagine that all the people living for today and life in peace with no borders. Imagine the world will be as one with no greed or hunger, and all the people sharing the entire world with love and unity.

There needs to be a next level understanding of technology, literacy and education, incorporating empathy, morality, and humanity.

The new ‘Media’ will tell the reality in truth and try to educate people about the harmony.

We invite you to take positive action and be part of the project as a collaborator in generating a body of knowledge toward making the invisible, visible.

This is an invitation in attending to something that positively serving and will help to change the perceptions of the mankind and the world for better.

What the project does: The project teaches us to live our lives with truth, honour, and integrity, and encourages for ourselves to recognize and judge things using our own perceptions and insights for ourselves, and being able to appreciate one another. Being and empowering journey of self-realization.

Activities: Education, program, & service -- Health (physically and spiritually), life, relationships, environments, global warming, energy and time.

The time for this project is always present, and the focus is on the RESULTS with caution and wisdom to accomplishes through its programs and services

Founder Statement/Wholeness in support of purpose

I, Atosa, have the feeling of enthusiasm and love for the independent rose in the heart of this project and integrity of souls in all its positive force. We all want to make things better for the world. We want to use technology to enhance our aims. Let’s take advantage of this good energy and satisfy our souls. We are delighted to have your enthusiastic support for this purpose which it will keep you motivated with the bond of love. This is wholeness offers direct opportunities of all sorts. I encourage you to project confidence to take advantage of a great timing to do somewhat completely new, smile and get in touch with our true purpose. This is really stimulating project which also bring financial breakthrough for whoever involves in early stages as an investors. You will be surprised at how well it will turns out.
Now is the moment in which we are creating the future.

The project’s intentions are to make the world a better place for all, more extensive in unity, more glamorous & beautiful with dignity.

The mission is broad enough to allow for growth and expansion. We keep the project clearly and strongly in focused.

Our group has authority created to value this aim.

THE REAL IMPORTANCE: WE NEED YOUR HELP!

Our goal for raising money is $25,000, to reach the goals, and as well as, to liven up the project with collaboration. It is a further request to participate in fundraising for humanitarian purposes.

The grant or donation you make is important in creating the opportunity to present our proposal to investors and to guide and shape our project in time.

We are looking for seed funds, vision grants, and/or investment in augmented reality for youth education -- proof of concept.

We Look for Corporate Funding and support for this start-up stage to pinpoint potential funding opportunities as well. This is a cultural, environmental, and technological project.​

I put a lot of time, effort and love into generating this project, so your currency makes my day! Please consider supporting the efforts in the competition against dark-media and the media-related.

​​You have the opportunity to participate in this manifestation event.​

We would like to extend our interest in forming a trust with you for this new ‘Media’. We believe that the ideas in further promotion of a better generation in the world and improve the satisfaction on all level.

Other Ways You Can Help: Spread The Word!

If you are not able to contribute, please help us spread the word and get this message out. Using the share links is just as appreciated!

Whether or not you can contribute, this is a great time to share with your fans and friends since the motivations gives them a chance to get involved on this journey!

Share: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and other social media pages about what we are doing. The more people know about this, the better! Let’s make this happen together.

Thank you very much for your time, and dearly, we hope to receive your favorable response.​

 Thanking you.

story:
UPDATE 8 hours before campaign was over:

BipCoin, alive and well. But Dot-Bip decentralized DNS is not happening. I refunded everyone's money. Did it now before campaign is over. From what Indiegogo told me, it seems like it's easier now than after campaign is over.

=-=-=-

 

Web Censorship is a Growing Problem

Many nations censor websites. And even the USA, long proud of its free speech, just elected a president who has threatened to stop journalists from criticizing him.

If you want to skip ahead and read our whitepaper, it's here:

  • Michael Dean and Dot-Bip team member Derrick Slopey did the FeenPhone campaigns on Indiegogo and  delivered on the promises of the campaigns. You can download that software and use it right now from www.feenphone.com
  • We have an existing cryptocurrency, BipCoin. It was released August 20, 2016. You can mine it and trade it right now. It's on an exchange and people are mining and using it. It's at https://bipcoin.org/
  • Our plan is to add decentralized DNS to BipCoin. Like what Namecoin promised, but never delivered in a usable way that got adoption.
  • Domain squatting was a huge problem for Namecoin. We will prevent that by auto-updating the price of auto-registering a domain to what is currently 8 dollars US.
  • This is expensive enough to prevent domain squatting, but cheap enough that anyone who can afford a web host can afford an uncensorable domain.
  • We will do this by auto-pegging the amount of BipCoin to register a domain to the current price of gold. We can do this through API integration and through basically having the program do a web search and intelligently seeing which of the results are current gold prices, then averaging them.
  • It will cost half as much for the first year, to encourage adoption.
  • There will be no third-party domain registrar, and thus no single point of failure.
  • We will provide ease of use by including a system-wide Dot-Bip domain resolver right in the BipCoin wallet. No third-party plugins will be required. Namecoin has been around five years and still isn't easy to use.
  • Other corporate blockchains that promise distributed DNS-like features are actually censorable, by the board of directors, and by pressure from governments.
  • Our software is always no-cost to download and use, and the source code is available on GitHub for inspection and creating derivations.
  • Our goal is to make us, the team, unneeded within three years of release of the first proof-of-concept working version of Dot-Bip.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need to hire two more top-notch C++ programmers who have blockchain experience (especially with CryptoNote). We have a team, but all the programmers have day jobs and families. The one non-programmer on the team (who came up with the concept, name and most of the whitepaper), can work full time overseeing and guiding this. So we need some hardcore full-time programmer folks to come in and kick butt full time for a little while to make this work, NOW.
  • We won't need repeated fundraisers. 80% of the BipCoin that people use to self-register domains will go to ongoing Dot-Bip and BipCoin ecosystem development.
  • The other 20% will go to four charities committed to freedom. (Free Ross, Anti-war.com, Restore the Fourth / Reinst8, and FIJA.org) Someone at each org has already agreed to this.
  • We'll also be providing these charities with free lifelong Dot-Bit domains and helping them configure everything.
  • We'll be spending some of the money on perks. Michael Dean has a 100% completion record with delivering all perks as described and on time in his 4 previous Indiegogo campaigns.
  • We're not charging extra money for shipping the perks. That's weak. People hate that. We'll be paying it out of our take.
  • We'll also be spending money on more servers, maybe some better web design, and misc. expenses. So far this has all been out of pocket, but we need your help to take it forward.
  • We'd love to make enough to set a little aside for any unforeseen contingencies. Including if we need to hire an attorney at any point. Trying to protect free speech is not free.
  • What you get: much more freedom in the world, lots of tyrants having a bad day because they can no longer "SHUT DOWN EVERYTHING! that's said bad about them. + Some cool perks.
  • Even without donating, once we go live, people will be able to help, and receive a share of the domain registration fees, by running a Gold Node. Gold Nodes will be special software running on user-owned Raspberry Pi computers. These computers are inexpensive (starting at around $35). Having a large number of these running around the world will increase the speed of transactions, plus do the work required to keep the price of registering domains consistent with worldwide prices of BipCoin (as measured to current gold price), regardless of that day's price of BipCoin. This will prevent domain squatting while also keeping the price of domain registration reasonable.

The Impact

Most people don't think about free speech until it's gone. You should think about free speech and talk about it NOW, while you still can.

We are NOT people who like to yell "the sky is falling." We keep a fairly positive attitude, and we hope you do too.

But we're also realists, and if you think free speech isn't in danger right now, you're not paying attention.

Risks & Challenges

  • Michael Dean has worked on four Indiegogo campaigns that have all used the money raised for exactly what he said he would. This can be verified easily, the products are available as a result of these fundraisers. He gets things done that he says he'll do. More on Michael's background is here: http://www.oreilly.com/pub/au/3220
  • Details on the other team members are here: https://bipcoin.org/?page_id=56
  • The challenge is to get this funded and done quickly enough to get adoption growing before the next round of "chilling effect" internet prosecutions happen. If we get funded, we are confident we can do this, based on our verifiable previous accomplishments presented here and in the above links.
  • If we can fund our whole goal, or near that goal, we believe we can have a solid, working beta to share with the world in a few months. This will include registration of domain names that will be on the mainnet blockchain of BipCoin, and will continue to be there as things grow and the software improves.
  • More money means less cutting corners, with everything. Yeah, members of our team have experience getting things done cheap, but it always involves some hardships. The more money, the less hardships, the more time the team has to work on going forward, instead of stumbling over "how do we do this for less money?"
  • If we can fund 1/4 to 2/3 of our goal, we will likely be able to get this done, it's just going to take a lot longer. And by then, free speech could be varying shades of illegal, so it may note be easy / possible to get this done then. This needs to be working well and getting adoption, pretty close to NOW.
  • If we get less than 1/4 of our goal, we will simply use that money to continue work on BipCoin in general, and on spreading the idea of this plan. We will continue doing outreach to explain why distributed DNS is NOT a "done deal" just because some things resembling it sort of exist. Those things have no adoption, and this needs ADOPTION. And if we get less than 1/4 of our goal, we'll keep trying to find someone else who can help do it, either on BipCoin or elsewhere. It's a solid plan and it needs to happen, even if it's not with BipCoin.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't open your pocketbook, at least open your heart and help out:

  • Please get the word out and tell 2 friends. (Or 200.)
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Post our link above to all your social networks.
  • Mine BipCoin. That strengthens the network, and costs nothing but the electricity to keep your computer on. Info is here: https://bipcoin.org/?page_id=16
  • Check out and share the charities we'll be donating part of the incoming registration BipCoin to. And share their links with people also:
  • https://freeross.org/
  • http://www.antiwar.com/
  • http://fija.org/
  • https://restorethe4th.com/

Thank you for helping and thank you for helping protect freedom of speech throughout the world.

<----------------------------->

CLOSING ARGUMENTS

Distributed DNS is one of the things always mentioned in any introductory article about "the wonders of the blockchain."

Sometimes they even mention Namecoin, or some of the new corporate blockchains. But these articles always act like it's already a done deal.

It's not.

They never mention that while this is technically possible, no one is actually using this yet. Because no one has solved the main problems and made it easy to use for everyone.

Henry Ford didn't invent the internal combustion engine, nor was he the first person to put one on a carriage to make it work without a horse.

But he did put a car in every carriage house. And when he started most people had never even seen a car.

He made cars practical and affordable.

We plan to do this for distributed, difficult-to-censor DNS.

Namecoin established some amazing concepts. But BipCoin will take these ideas and make them easy to adopt for everyone.

But BipCoin will take these ideas and make them easy to adopt for everyone.

story:
Our area has many things to do, but one thing we don't have which we did for years, is a family entertainment spot which is really needed. A skating rink was the local favorite thing to do in our area for many many years. We would like to bring this back to make more family memories, but also give the families another great choice to get together ,off devices and having fun. Our mission is to raise funds and purchase or remodel a space and build a fun skating rink for our area. Community support is there and we are at the early stages of seeking funding to complete this Project. 

Donations will 100% used for funding this project and open transparent updates will happen as we Progress.

story:
Short Summary

Do you visit or live in the midwest? Familiar with the Bayfield/Ashland area of Wisconsin? Love the mid-mod era and style? Nostalgic for bygone mid-century motor lodge memories?  Then read on because your contributions will buy you room credit in the hippest motel on Lake Superior!

  • Who we are: Husband and wife of 24 years, Christi is a former restaurant server and currently a vintage reseller in a shop in Stillwater, MN and on Etsy. I (Mike) am a retired elementary school teacher who also worked in restaurants and hotels many many years ago! Currently I run a cinematic videography business (Storyteller Videography). Last year, we sold our family business, a vintage ice cream truck (STREET TREATS ICE CREAM on FB) which we built from the ground up and ran successfully in the St. Croix Valley for 9 years! 
  • Christi has had the dream of running a small motel for awhile now.  Her love for the mid mod style has helped to forge a vision of running a small motel completely redone in this style to bring back the nostalgia of a bygone era. We know we can do it... we did it with an ice cream truck! I wasn't too hip to the idea until we found a small, 8 room motel in Ashland, WI right on Lake Superior.  And yes, we've heard we can even put a dock in!  We believe we're both well suited for this with many years of experience in the service industry!
  • Bringing this dream to fruition will be good for Ashland and surrounding communities.  There are already reasons to come to the Ashland area which span the calendar!  Unfortunately most of the period motels in the area have become rundown and don't take on guests as they have turned to housing long term residents.  Often visitors to the area for the annual marathon or other events are forced to stay over an hour away!  We may not have a lot of rooms, but we'll also be looking into the legalities of offering limited camping on our large lot during major events!

What We Need & What You Get

  • The Ashland Area Development Corporation is fantastic to work with and offers matching funds necessary to get businesses going!  We are seeking to take advantage of this money to close the gap in our down payment to purchase the future Atomic Motel.  If we meet our goals, funds from our Indiegogo campaign would be used in two ways: First, to complete our financing structure to secure the property, and second to give us a head start on remodeling into an authentic mid century modern style.  Each room will be completely remodeled by me and when necessary, outside contractors.  Though we will sink the vast majority of funds earned from bookings upon taking ownership back into the motel, additional funds will be needed because, as you all likely know, remodeling isn't cheap!
  • The BEST BEST BEST part of our campaign is it doesn't involve keychains or t-shirts... or even thank you post cards! Each dollar contributed is directly transferred in our books to room credit.  Even a small contribution will be directly discounted from your room when you make it to The Atomic.  If we don't meet our goal, you're not out a dime! We're also putting some sweet packages together too, so if you need a place for that long overdue family reunion, we'll offer up our whole motel, all 8 rooms for you to set aside for a one of a kind get away with your loved ones!  We even have a "Videography/Motel Stay" package to preserve the memories you make on your North Shore stay!  We are so excited to see you up in Ashland and we want to make you our personal guests... we promise to treat you right!  And cosmopolitans on the shore at sunset aren't out of the question!
  • The great thing about our campaign is we have opted for an all or nothing effort.  Although the Indiegogo platform takes your funds upon pledging, we will NOT take your money and use it towards our efforts unless we KNOW we have secured this property and can bring our dream to fruition!  If our goal is not met by the deadline, all contributions are returned!  Our goal is a Grand Opening of the re-branded ATOMIC MOTEL in the late spring/early summer of 2017!

The Impact

  • We have the vision to make The Atomic a gathering place for the community as well!  Being right on the lake in this beautiful setting will allow us to host open mic nights, small concerts with local musicians, mid mod fairs and perhaps car or motorcycle shows.  We envision these free events to help build community spirit in the Ashland area!
  • We know we're able to be successful in this endeavor!  We both have a track record in the service industry, Christi is an enthusiast in the mid mod style (heck we already own half of what it would take to furnish the place!) and we've already built one nostalgic business successfully!  There is no way to explain the impact bringing back the vintage ice cream truck had on the community.  Over the years we saw neighbors come to the corners and linger while catching up on vacations or local news. We saw the unifying effect it had on street after street in the communities we served, and we want to bring this spirit with us to the Ashland area!
  • Everyone goes somewhere at sometime.  Many thousands of people visit the Ashland/Bayfield area every year!  Ashland was just named one of the 10 most underrated towns in the state by a Wisconsin paper!  We think our creativity and passion can help bring new and fresh ideas into the community which will draw even more visitors to town.  More visitors mean more money for local small businesses run by other families along the North Shore!  If you believe in small business, contribute and get a room at The Atomic!

Risks & Challenges

There are limited risks to this adventure, which of course, we'll minimize as much as possible going forward.  However after looking at the books of the previous owner, we have a hard time seeing how we wouldn't make a small boutique hotel successful!  We may need to hire a full time employee for a time (as a grant requirement) and we've never had to do that... so I guess that could be a challenge!

  • This industry of course relies on bookings.  In crunching numbers and considering a conservative occupancy rate, we're confident we can easily continue to pay the bills. If one of us dies, that's what life insurance is for!
  • Now if the economy really tanks and we were to be extremely slow and had low numbers of guests all year long, which I can't imagine, then we do have our current business income to rely on.  Our living quarters are attached to the motel, so the nice thing is we have no separate mortgage payment! There are virtually no other cinematic videographers in the area, so there is an untapped market for my work and I'm already in discussions with some local parties!  We also intend to operate Christi's vintage shop on site, so that is additional income we don't lose!
  • We also need to work with the city to ensure some of our vision, such as neon, a dock in the lake, and perhaps even a liquor license might be attainable. *Perks where a complimentary drink is mentioned should be no issue if you are personal guests to our home, which is onsite... but we'll get some clarity on that!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand you may never make it up our way to the OTHER coast... the North Coast... but you can still help tremendously if you believe in our goals!

  • We are currently on Facebook as TheAtomicMotelWI and  Twitter and Instagram as TheAtomicMotel. Follow us there!  Share our posts!  Talk us up in groups you're active in or to those you know come to our area. All through the remodeling process we'll be active on social media posting photos and videos so we'd love for you to follow along and share what you think is cool!
  • And don't forget, you can use the Indiegogo share tools to make thinks easy for friends and family to find out what we're doing!

story:
RISKS AND THREATS IN THE GLOBAL BLUE (OCEAN) ECONOMY AFFECT US ALL

Two thirds of the world is water that moves over 90% of world trade.  This global Blue Economy is fraught with multiple risks and threats - whether you sail the seas, are a maritime enthusiast, care about the ocean environment, or are worried about the supply chain we can provide you with sophisticated maritime threat analysis. 

Hi! I am Captain Jatin Bains who has been associated with the Blue (Ocean) Economy for 35+ years first as a ship captain and subsequently in ship management and most recently in maritime security. I am also the creator of the CATE (Computer Assisted Threat Evaluation) System which can help users find the proverbial “needle in the haystack” with regard to risks in the maritime domain.  Unfortunately, since 9/11, maritime security has actually declined worldwide with a significant rise in piracy, oil thefts, illegal fishing, environmental accidents, human and arms smuggling, incursions into Exclusive Economic Zones (EEZs), supply chain delays due to enhanced maritime security, bank liens, arrests, negligence, and the list goes on and on. The shipping industry as a whole operates on razor thin margins and is struggling with financial losses leading to consolidation and bankruptcies; economies of scale are not there, the new mega-ships are being laid-up instead of operating half empty; new regulations like container weights and carbon emissions are cost prohibitive to the ship operator, and there is little transparency on governance and compliance. Global maritime safety and security enforcement is declining and current trends indicate that 2017 will see more risk. My team and I have built over the last 15 years the CATE™ System that addresses risks and threats to the Blue Economy.  CATE™ has been successfully deployed and used operationally in Asia for 10 years.

We believe there is now an insatiable appetite for a cost effective analysis platform that identifies these potential maritime risks and threats. CATE™ currently develops threat analysis using 50+ data sources and we are now in the process of adding satellite imagery data to perform the risk evaluation. Satellite imagery is proving to be another key data layer we are deploying and wish to ingest more on a global scale.  We are seeking funding now to scale the CATE™ System to include more satellite data and deploy it as a Software as a Service (SaaS) model to bring the price point down. To do this we need to raise $5 Million to buy additional satellite data, scale CATE™ and to build an effective marketing campaign. I have built and enhanced the CATE™ platform with a bootstrap budget over 15 years and we have been good stewards of public funds.

I am now able to share the analysis we perform as “Perks” with you and feel it is of interest to boaters, maritime enthusiasts, supply chain logisticians, environmentalists, security and safety professionals, etc. The Blue Economy affects all of us and ‘knowledge is power.’ I want to be able to offer our military grade technology to ordinary users at an affordable price. This is possible with cloud computing and a SaaS delivery model using a simple browser.

As an example, over $20 Billion of fish is stolen illegally from African waters every year. We can give anyone interested in helping the African governments secure their fishing rights by using CATE™.  The impact to African economies could be a game changer.  As CATE™ risk modeling capability become available to more people around the world the global community can help Africa enhance its coastal awareness and give them a tool to go after the poachers. Help us counter the growing risks of operating in the Blue Economy and make a contribution to building a safer world for us and the next generation.

 The Blue Economy Risk Portal is in Beta Testing with live data.

Please help us scale and thanks in advance for your consideration.

story:
We are temporarily suspending our Indiegogo, you will all receive your money back.


Gaming Store For Gamers By Gamers!

Hi We're Joe & Joe! We are seeking funding to help us open our gaming store!

  • Joseph Rogers - I've been playing Magic: the Gathering since 1995. I have been in the gaming culture for several years. It's been my dream to open a gaming store for over 10 years.  I have over twelve years in retail management experience. 

  • Joseph Abdallah - I have been playing Magic: the Gathering since early 1994. I am a fan of board games and role-playing games. I worked in a and managed a gaming store for over seven years. I have a technical background and have been working tech support for a web based floral company.

  • Our campaign is important to us because we both want to bring a unique experience to the local community.  We have a passion for gaming and we want to share that with our community. 

  • Your contributions will help the dream of this store become a reality. This funding will ensure that the store will be a unique, fun experience for all gamers.  

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking at a goal of $7,500 for working capital to use for inventory and fixtures. We plan to carry a full line of Collectible Card Games, Role Playing games, and Board Games. We also will be using this funding to help purchase tables and chairs to host gaming events. 

  • We've got some unique perks! These include free event entry, gift cards and Kobolds!

  • Any funds we recieve will be going towards our start up costs, even if we do not reach our goal.

The Impact!

The store will be valuable to you as gamers, a place where all  can gather and have fun! Meet new people, make new friends, find new games and hobbies. The customer is the heart of the store and we want everyone to feel welcome and have fun. 

Risks!

The main risk to opening this business is profitability, as you may know some sealed gaming products do not have a lot of margin. To solve this risk we will be offering a diverse range of products with higher margins.

Other Ways You Can Help!

Even if you can not contribute, please share this with your friends on Facebook and please check out the Indiegogo site tools to share this campaign!

Thank you for your support!
