story:
For the English, look at the BOLD.

Pokreće nas to da ono što obično nedostaje nisu nove ideje, nego volja da se one realizuju. 
Mnogi mladi umjetnici ,fotografi, dizajneri, filmmakeri,...  - kreatori općenito, i čak starije kolege imaju potrebu za prostorom u kojem mogu udobno boraviti, družiti se, upoznavati nove ljude, prezentovati svoj rad, održati radionicu, prisustvovati radionici, naučiti nove stvari i ostvarivati saradnje.

We're driven by our collective will to create, to realize an idea, have it come to life, not just to have one. 

A plethora of young artists, photographers, designers, and generally creative people, no matter their age, need such a space where they can feel comfortable, feel welcome so that they can meet new people, socialize, share ideas, host workshops, presentations. They need a chance for a fresh perspective, a fresh set of eyes on their creations, and a place where they can learn new things and a chance for new opportunities.


Prostor je najneuhvatljivija stvar je rečenica američkog YouTubera Caseyja Neistata čijim konceptom 368 smo u velikoj mjeri inspirisani.

We're inspired by Casey Neistat's 368 concept, where he says: The space is the most elusive thing.

Ideja je jednostavna: pronaći veliki prostor, nabaviti gomilu opreme za kreativce, napraviti dio opreme koji im treba i pozvati ih da dođu. Ali, sve to i nije baš toliko jednostavno. 
Tad se odlučujemo za crowdfunding kampanju.

The idea is quite simple: Find a big space, get a ton of equipment, and get creative people inside! Well, it sounds simple, but it's not.

That's why we've decided to create this crowdfunding campaign. 

Vjerujemo da crowdfunding ima puno veći smisao od prikupljanja sredstava. Vjerujemo da je rad zajednice najefikasniji za pozitivnu promjenu u društvu.
Creative Space Sarajevo je projekat namijenjen zajednici. Vizija je da svaki pojedinac ostavi trag u kreiranju pozitivne promjene u gradu Sarajevu, a i životima kreativaca - jer će im zasigurno ponuditi dosta toga vrijednog za njihov napredak.

We went with crowdfunding because we believe that the work of the community is the most effective and natural way of making a positive change in our society. 

Our whole dream, our passion, our idea for Creative Space Sarajevo revolves around the community. Our vision revolves around giving every individual creator a chance to create their piece of positive change for Sarajevo, and of course, their professional careers as well. A project like this coming to life will surely go a long way for everyone making progress in their professional growth.

Konceptualno je Space samoodrživi projekat (više informacija ispod), te je iz tog razloga vrijedan podrške uz misiju za otvaranje novih radnih mjesta, ali isto tako i doprinos kreatorima da uz neke mogućnosti koje ćemo pružati proširuju svoja znanja i samim tim postaju uspješniji u svojim poslovima.
Pored toga, svjesni situacije u kojoj se naše društvo nalazi, smo željeli na ovaj način pokazati kolika je zapravo potreba za Creative Spaceom u Sarajevu, u nadi da ćemo tokom našeg puta naići i na razumijevanje lokalne uprave.

Conceptually, this is a self-sustaining project (more info below), and that's also part of the reason why it's worth supporting it. Besides giving every creator a real chance to learn new things and progress in their work, our mission is also to create new jobs. 

We're also using this opportunity to show just how much a project like this is needed in Sarajevo, and we hope that we'll find support from the local government along the way.


I na kraju, vjerujemo da je ideja  (koju je zajednica u manje od 24 sata nakon što je objavljen naš Instagram profil @creativespacesarajevo podržala u ogromnoj količini - na stotine poruka podrške, prijedloga, savjeta i partnerstava je ostvareno) zrela za ovakvu vrstu kampanje.

Mi kreativci stalno sharujemo radove jedni drugih, podržavamo se i zbog toga će slogan Creative Spacea biti: WE RISE BY LIFTING OTHERS.

We genuinely believe that this idea is more than deserving for this type of campaign. The community vouched for that themselves; we've received a massive amount of comments, shares, and all kinds of support 24hrs after sharing our idea on creativespacesarajevo's Instagram profile.

Creative people always support each other by helping promote and share our work, and hence, our slogan will be:

Creative Space Sarajevo je zamišljen kao samoodrživi community centar
koji se nalazi unutar višenamjenskog prostora osmišljenog od kreatora za kreatore.

Creative Space Sarajevo was designed as a self-sustaining community center located inside a multipurpose space, designed by creators, for creators.

Svi su dobrodošli, namijenjen je svima i moguće je da apsolutno svi koriste sadržaje.
Sve vrste kreatora, u bilo kojoj branši poslovanja, onih koji tek počinju, oni koji već imaju uspješne karijere, oni koji su u posjeti Sarajevu - pa im treba prostor za montažu, upload, ili bilo šta drugo.

We want to make this for everyone, and all will be welcome to use all of the center's content. All types of creators, no matter the industry, skill level, experience, successful entrepreneurs, or amateurs. Even those merely visiting Sarajevo and need a place to edit a clip or upload a file, when we say everyone – we mean it!

Pošto je cijeli projekat osmišljen tako da bi bio samoodrživ unutar Creative Spacea će u lounge zoni postojati coffee shop, food corner, itd. Pored toga radićemo na redovnim sedmičnim i mjesečnim eventima, radionicama, konferencijama, festivalima, promocijama i slično. I takodjer, ćemo imati i coworking prostor - gdje ćete moći putem članarine imati svoj radni sto i ormarić kojem samo vi pristupate kada ste u Creative Spaceu.

Creative Space Sarajevo will be designed into multiple areas. We'll have a place where we'll meet for weekly, monthly events, workshops, festivals, promos, etc. Then we'll have a coworking space where everyone will be able to get their very own work desk and cabinet on a membership plan. We'll also have a lounge area (of course) with things like a food corner and a coffee shop. 

Lounge Space je zamišljen kao prostor u kojem mogu boraviti svi posjetioci Creative Spacea.
Funkcionisao bi u self-service principu: dakle, na šanku preuzmete svoje piće i sjednete gdje god vam odgovara.

Ono što smatramo da je važno napomenuti jeste da planiramo da budu dostupni isključivo #387 proizvodi. Pored toga, nećemo u posluživanju koristiti single-use plastiku. 

Ispod je par primjera kako bi mi voljeli da to izgleda. Updateovat ćemo fotografije, kada kompletiramo dizajn interijera.

We've imagined the Lounge Space as an area where everyone can come sit down, grab a cup of coffee from the bar and relax. 

We're also very excited to use this opportunity to offer only #387 products; no single-use plastic will be used!

Take a look at some of our concept ideas below; we'll update the images once we complete our interior design.

 

Free Space je slobodni prostor namijenjen radionicama, promocijama, projekcijama, prezentacijama i slično. Dakle prostor koji će biti moguće transformisati u bilo koju navedenu svrhu u veoma kratkom roku. I ukoliko bude potrebno širenje njegovih kapaciteta u kontekstu broja osoba, uvijek će biti dostupno korištenje i dijelova lounge spacea.

Naša zamisao je da izgleda ovako.

Free Space is one of the areas that's meant for workshops, promos, presentations, etc. In other words, we'll be able to quickly transform this area into anything that we need at that time. Even if we need to expand its capacity, our design will allow for a part of the Lounge Space to be used instead.

This is how we see it.

 

Coworking space je prostor u koji svakodnevno možeš odlaziti, sjediti za stolom ili "zavaljen" u lazy bag, biti okružen ljudima sličnih ambicija i raditi. Istina je da podsjeća na rad kod kuće, ali rad u coworking prostoru efikasniji, stvara strukturu u vašem životu, unaprijedjuje networking, i daje druge efekte.

Coworking zona unutar Creative Spacea Sarajevo će biti jedan od njegovih komercijalnih strana. Ono što svakako možemo garantovati je da će biti pristupačan svima.

On bi trebao izgledati ovako.

Coworking Space is an area where you can come and go daily, sit down at a desk, or throw yourself in one of the lazy bags. This is where you can surround yourself with creative, ambitious people and work. It's something like working from home, but since it's not home – coming here will help you get a sense of structure in your life, you'll be able to network, be more efficient, and otherwise improve. 

This is one of the commercial areas of Creative Space, but we guarantee it'll be more than affordable to absolutely everyone!

This is how we see it.

 

Studijski prostor je bila pokretačka misija cijelog projekta. 
Zamišljeno je da u prvobitnoj fazi postoji fotografski studio, sa nekoliko fotografskih pozadina i opremljen rasvjetom, te podcast studio sa nekoliko snimača zvuka i gluhom sobom.

S obzirom na fazu u kojoj se sad nalazimo, vjerujemo da ćemo moći proširiti to i na green key i white cikloramu, product photography studio, pa čak i streaming rooms, te kuhinja za food bloggere.

Studio Space je radni prostor. Dostupan svima, uz najave i rezervacije hourly-based termina. Prednost će, radi našeg poslovanja, morati imati korisnici coworking spacea, odnosno postojat će dnevni termini koji su dostupni svima, kao i termini za korisnike coworking spacea.

Uz potencijalne partnere će biti omogućen i GEAR LOCKER - ormarić sa opremom dostupnom za korištenje unutar Creative Spacea.

Studio Space was the original idea behind the whole project. In its initial stage, we see it as a photography studio with a few backgrounds, lightning, and as a podcast studio with a couple of sound recorders and a deaf room.

But that's just the beginning. After getting here, we'll want to expand and offer things like green key, white cyclorama, product photography, and even streaming rooms and a kitchen-room for food bloggers!

Studio Space is a work area. Available to everyone through reservations on an hourly basis. Coworking Space users will have to have an advantage due to our business and progress; there'll be daily schedules that are available for everyone, as well as a schedule for Coworking Space users. 

With potential partners, we'll be able to offer GEAR LOCKERS, a cabinet with equipment for use inside Creative Space.

 

Svi koji su u kreativnom poslu, znaju vrijednost odredjene opreme. 
Crowdfunding koristimo kao početni boost za uredjenje prostora i kupovinu fotografskih pozadina, rasvjete, snimača zvuka i kamera, te za troškove osnivanja firme da bismo u što skorijem roku mogli početi ostvarivati neke od dogovorenih partnerstava, kao i stvaranje novih. 

This crowdfunding campaign should give us a starting boost for space decoration and equipment; things like cameras, photo backgrounds, lightning, sound recorders, and for things like costs of establishing the company, all so we could get this idea off the ground as soon as possible. We want to start creating new partnerships, as well as realize our existing ones.

Cilj od 20.000$ postavljen na kampanju je samo jedan dio sredstava potrebnih da prostor funkcioniše - ali gradićemo ciglu po ciglu. Ukoliko ispunimo cilj, nastavljamo i dalje prikupljati sredstva da ubrzamo neke procese, a ako ne - s njim ćemo ostvariti barem za neki mali prostor, koji će i bez obzira na to moći biti pravi community centar i koji će imati sve što smo zamislili u nekom manjem obliku.

Our $20.000 goal would help us realize the basics of Creative Space, and it's just a part of the puzzle – but we're going at this brick by brick, we want to do this right. If we achieve our goal, we'll continue collecting funds to speed things up even more, and if not, we'll use what we get to create the starting space on a smaller scale. The point is, we'll create a real-life community center that we imagined, no matter on what scale.

Posebne čari crowdfundinga su perkovi koje možemo ponuditi zauzvrat. Iako su oni najčešće simbolični, mi smo se potrudili da u njih stavimo stvari isključivo vezane za Creative Space Sarajevo i korištenje njegovih kapaciteta.

Besides offering to create something for the community, we've also tried to add a few symbolic perks for this campaign. We've made an effort to provide direct Creative Space benefits through these perks that revolve around using its capacities.

Creative Space Sarajevo je trenutno u fazi pripreme za registraciju firme. 
Pored toga smo u pregovorima sa organizacijama, sponzorima, vlastima, ali i vlasnicima prostora. 
Ono što nas raduje je to da smo jako blizu dogovora sa Centrom Skenderija vezano za prostor u kojem se trenutno nalazi ARS AEVI! 

Updejtovat ćemo i informisati vas redovno. 
Pratite nas na Instagramu: @creativespacesarajevo

Za sva pitanja i prijedloge bilo koje vrste kontaktirajte nas na: creativespacesarajevo@gmail.com ili na +387 62 103 899 - pozivom ili SMS-om.

Creative Space Sarajevo is currently in a phase of establishing and registering the company. We're also in active negotiations with sponsors, the government, real estate owners, and organizations.

We're delighted to say that we're very close to striking a deal with Sarajevo's Center space Skenderija, where ARS AEVI is currently located at.

We're going to update this campaign with new information regularly. 

Follow us on Instagram: @creativespacesarajevo.

For all inquiries and suggestions of any kind, reach us at:

creativespacesarajevo@gmail.com, or at +387 62 103 899 – by call or SMS message.
story_txt:
For the English, look at the BOLD.

Pokreće nas to da ono što obično nedostaje nisu nove ideje, nego volja da se one realizuju. Mnogi mladi umjetnici ,fotografi, dizajneri, filmmakeri,...  - kreatori općenito, i čak starije kolege imaju potrebu za prostorom u kojem mogu udobno boraviti, družiti se, upoznavati nove ljude, prezentovati svoj rad, održati radionicu, prisustvovati radionici, naučiti nove stvari i ostvarivati saradnje.
We're driven by our collective will to create, to realize an idea, have it come to life, not just to have one. 
A plethora of young artists, photographers, designers, and generally creative people, no matter their age, need such a space where they can feel comfortable, feel welcome so that they can meet new people, socialize, share ideas, host workshops, presentations. They need a chance for a fresh perspective, a fresh set of eyes on their creations, and a place where they can learn new things and a chance for new opportunities.
Prostor je najneuhvatljivija stvar je rečenica američkog YouTubera Caseyja Neistata čijim konceptom 368 smo u velikoj mjeri inspirisani.
We're inspired by Casey Neistat's 368 concept, where he says: The space is the most elusive thing.Ideja je jednostavna: pronaći veliki prostor, nabaviti gomilu opreme za kreativce, napraviti dio opreme koji im treba i pozvati ih da dođu. Ali, sve to i nije baš toliko jednostavno. Tad se odlučujemo za crowdfunding kampanju.
The idea is quite simple: Find a big space, get a ton of equipment, and get creative people inside! Well, it sounds simple, but it's not.
That's why we've decided to create this crowdfunding campaign. 

Vjerujemo da crowdfunding ima puno veći smisao od prikupljanja sredstava. Vjerujemo da je rad zajednice najefikasniji za pozitivnu promjenu u društvu.Creative Space Sarajevo je projekat namijenjen zajednici. Vizija je da svaki pojedinac ostavi trag u kreiranju pozitivne promjene u gradu Sarajevu, a i životima kreativaca - jer će im zasigurno ponuditi dosta toga vrijednog za njihov napredak.
We went with crowdfunding because we believe that the work of the community is the most effective and natural way of making a positive change in our society. 
Our whole dream, our passion, our idea for Creative Space Sarajevo revolves around the community. Our vision revolves around giving every individual creator a chance to create their piece of positive change for Sarajevo, and of course, their professional careers as well. A project like this coming to life will surely go a long way for everyone making progress in their professional growth.Konceptualno je Space samoodrživi projekat (više informacija ispod), te je iz tog razloga vrijedan podrške uz misiju za otvaranje novih radnih mjesta, ali isto tako i doprinos kreatorima da uz neke mogućnosti koje ćemo pružati proširuju svoja znanja i samim tim postaju uspješniji u svojim poslovima.Pored toga, svjesni situacije u kojoj se naše društvo nalazi, smo željeli na ovaj način pokazati kolika je zapravo potreba za Creative Spaceom u Sarajevu, u nadi da ćemo tokom našeg puta naići i na razumijevanje lokalne uprave.
Conceptually, this is a self-sustaining project (more info below), and that's also part of the reason why it's worth supporting it. Besides giving every creator a real chance to learn new things and progress in their work, our mission is also to create new jobs. 
We're also using this opportunity to show just how much a project like this is needed in Sarajevo, and we hope that we'll find support from the local government along the way.
I na kraju, vjerujemo da je ideja  (koju je zajednica u manje od 24 sata nakon što je objavljen naš Instagram profil @creativespacesarajevo podržala u ogromnoj količini - na stotine poruka podrške, prijedloga, savjeta i partnerstava je ostvareno) zrela za ovakvu vrstu kampanje.Mi kreativci stalno sharujemo radove jedni drugih, podržavamo se i zbog toga će slogan Creative Spacea biti: WE RISE BY LIFTING OTHERS.

Creative people always support each other by helping promote and share our work, and hence, our slogan will be:

story:
Votre investissement couvrira une partie ou l'ensemble de la restauration  du bateau. L'aboutissement de restauration du San Georgio sauvera ce patrimoine maritime en voie de disparition. Cela vous donnera peut-être la chance de voyager et décourvir la Nouvelle-Calédonie

Your investment will cover parts or the entire boat rebuilt. The outcome of the rebuild of San Georgio will save this disappering maritime heritage. It will may give you the chance to travel and discover  New Caledonia.

Vous pouvez être actionnaire. Etant gérant au sein de la coopérative qui restaurera le San Georgio et l'exploitera commercialement avec touristes et locaux. Vos fonds investis peuvent être récupérés dans un délai qui n'excédera pas 15 ans.

You can be a shareholder. Being involved in the management of the corporation that will achieve the rebuild of San Georgio and wil operate the boat commercialy with tourists and locals. Your invested funds can be refundable within 15 years.

L'étude de marché et sondages ont été fait par les étudiants de l'école générale de commerce à Nouméa. Business plan et prévisionnels financiers sont disponibles. L'étude s'est faite sur une moyenne stable de 100 000 touristes par an et prenant en compte le dernier report en 2017 de 201 navires de croisières par an en escale à Nouméa soit un marché moyen annuel de 450 000 croisiéristes. La communauté urbaine de la ville de Nouméa et grand Nouméa compte 175 000 personnes sur une population totale de Nouvelle-Calédonie de 280 000.

Market study and surveys have been done by the students graduated from the Noumea Business University. Business Plan and Financial forecast are availables. The survey takes into account the stable average of 100 000 tourists per year and the last report of an 201 cruise ships in 2017 in Noumea with 472 000 peoples. The area of Noumea City counts just over 175 000 persons for the 280 000 the actual population of New Caledonia.

Statisques, prévisionnels financiers, cash flows  rassurera vos investissements. Le montant entier investi pour reconstruire San Georgio est amorti sur 15 années d'exploitation commerciale. Les charges croissantes au cours de l'age d'exploitation du bateau sont provisionnées dès la première année d'exploitation, celles-ci peuvent être revues à la baisse suivant les conventions d'investissements et publicitaires conclues.

Statistics and financials forecasts with cash flows charts will reassure your investments. The whole amount invested to rebuild San Georgio is covered in 15 years of commercial uses of the boat. The increases of charges and costs that arise after 10 years for a boat maintenance are provisioned straight after the rebuild after the first year of operations.

Vous pouvez participer à la restauration du bateau pour amour du projet. Une partie du bateau portera votre nom  vous pourrez venir la contempler lors de votre venue en Nouvelle-Calédonie. La coopérative honorifiera votre participation et pourra éventuellement te permettre de sortir en mer à bord du San Georgio sur une sortie planifiée à la hauteur de ta participation financière.

You can be a stakeholder you own a part of the boat rebuilt. The part of the boat you pay will own your name and will be incomed in the corporation budget. Also the corporation may be able to let you sailing onboard San Georgio following schedules and high of your participation in the rebuild.

Un blog montrera l’avancé du chantier ; le développement de la coopération de gestion et les sorties en mer programmées une à deux fois tous les jours de l’année. L’état financier de l’entreprise sera publié régulièrement.

A blog will show the progress of the yard; the development of the corporation and boat in operations. The financial statements will be edited continuously every periods of time.

La rénovation et le lancement de cette entreprise créera de l’emploi local estimé à 25 personnes la première de chantier aidera des personnes en difficultés de se former et de se réinsérer professionnellement.  Une filière construction bois et vieux gréement sera lancée.

The rebuild will help persons with difficulties to be retrained and get professional integration in New Caledonia.

As lover of sea life style and sailing every day; I am passionated for maritime heritage.

San Georgio is a Trabacollo based in Noumea New Caledonia. The boat built in 1938 in Civita Vecchia (Italy).

Your funds will restore:

Hull                      700 000 €

Main Deck           100 000 €

Sails                      70 000 €

Masts                  150 000 €

Wheel                     5 000 €

Yards and Booms 10 000 €

Ship Chandleries and Safety Equipment  60 000€

Engine ang Generator                            300 000 €

Architect and Class Inspection                 70 000 €

Crane                                                        20 000 €

Slipway                 30 000 €

Tools workshops   40 000 €

  
Scaffolding            50 000 €  
   
Wood                   200 000 €  
   

Electricity              18 000 €

Marine Electronics 22 000€

Your investment will cover parts or the entire boat rebuilt. The outcome of the rebuild of San Georgio will save this disappering maritime heritage. It will may give you the chance to travel and discover  New Caledonia.
Vous pouvez être actionnaire. Etant gérant au sein de la coopérative qui restaurera le San Georgio et l'exploitera commercialement avec touristes et locaux. Vos fonds investis peuvent être récupérés dans un délai qui n'excédera pas 15 ans.

La communauté urbaine de la ville de Nouméa et grand Nouméa compte 175 000 personnes sur une population totale de Nouvelle-Calédonie de 280 000.

story:
Who we are:

  Hello, Bonjour, مرحبا. We are Soulef (from Tunisia) and Meggie (from China), we want to build a nursery school for children from 5 to 10 years old in a community of Tunis, the capital city of Tunisia. Nowadays, more and more Tunisian parents have been occupied with their work and even don’t have time to accompany and take care of their children. We try to establish this small but cozy nursery school to take care and tutor kids to ensure that they are growing up healthily and happily.

 

Why we aim to do that:

  On the one hand, we want to help those Tunisian children to receive responsible and suitable growing-up guidance and assist in reducing the burdens on children’s parents. The community in Tunis urgently needs a trustworthy and professional nursery school.

  On the other hand, we want to buy a cozy apartment for Soulef’s two sons after years’ of good operation. Soulef Hadj Brahim, a single mom, wants to spare no efforts to buy a cozy apartment for her two kids one day to stop keeping renting and moving house. Soulef has been an excellent Arabic teacher for more than thirteen years, whose students range from small kids to old people. What’s more, she is proficient in Arabic, French, and English.

  Every children deserves to have a cozy home, in which there are families, hot water, clean bed, and table, in which they don’t have to worry about one day they have to pick up their luggage and move their house again, in which they can plant flowers with their mom freely, in which they can invite their friends to come and play together. Children’s dream is mom’s dream, and also dreams for all of us.

     

What we do:

  For the school daycare:

  • We take care of primary pupils between 5 and 10 years
  • Children can receive super daycare and supervision after school
  • Children can get extra tutorial guidance
  • Children have chances to go to clubs: theaters, art museums, culture activities
  • Children ‘s interest and schedules will be tracked and followed as they are with their parents

 

 

We need $9999 to launch our project, the money we raise from the platform we go toward:

  • The first three months renting fee for the nursery
  • Layout and renovation fee (including safety facilities)
  • Children’s products procurement: toys, textbooks, tableware
  • Teacher’s salary for the first month

 

We promise we will invest all the money we raise into this project, during the preparation time, you can see our expenditure details.

 

Currently, we are starting our project from finding a good location. Come and join us to witness our progress! Starting a new business is risky and exhausting, but every moment when we think about children’s big smile, we forget all the pain and keep moving forward.

We thank you for your support and prepare some small perks for you

Can't donate? You can still help!

Please share this campaign! You can use the Indiegogo share tools to share it to others. One of the best things you can do is help connect us with others, and we'd be so grateful if you share this on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, email, or wherever else you reach people! Thank you in advance!

story:
Our story

My name is Clever Mukori and i'm the Founder of Learn Or Teach. I am an immigrant from Zimbabwe and I came to the United States in 2012. In 2017, I graduated from Concordia College in Moorhead, MN and went on to start Learn Or Teach the following year. 

Learn Or Teach is a corporate learning company that specializes in custom course creation and hosting services. We provide a learning management system on which organizations can create and host online courses, for employee, partner, and even customer training.

Given the disruption wreaked by the Corona virus in the past few weeks, demand for our services has skyrocketed as organizations of all shapes and sizes resort to remote work to maintain productivity. While current solutions on the market are fragmented, we eliminate the need to hire an instructional designer, a graphic designer, a videographer, a content editor, and learning management system services separately. We are a one stop solution that thereby lowers the barrier to entry for small and mid-sized businesses

We need your help expanding our course creation equipment to address the sudden spike in demand for custom online course creation. Previously we had been renting equipment and it is proving to be too expensive to do and not a sensible alternative given the demand we are facing at present.

 

Here Is A Sample Of Our Work To Date

This customer had a construction safety training company. We created online courses for them from print material and recorded in person training sessions that were converted into online video learning content.

 
Maybe you are interested in more soft skill like training, here is sample of content we have made in that space (Leadership Training Content for Ramsey County, MN)
 

 

Given the disruption wreaked by the Corona virus in the past few weeks, demand for our services has skyrocketed as organizations of all shapes and sizes resort to remote work to maintain productivity. While current solutions on the market are fragmented, we eliminate the need to hire an instructional designer, a graphic designer, a videographer, a content editor, and learning management system services separately. We are a one stop solution that thereby lowers the barrier to entry for small and mid-sized businesses

We need your help expanding our course creation equipment to address the sudden spike in demand for custom online course creation. Previously we had been hiring equipment and it is proving to be too expensive to do and not a sensible alternative given the demand we are facing at present.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our needs:

  • Two professional grade cameras with a built in microphone and wireless microphone facility. One will capture the wide angle and another will capture motions and the close up view. The cameras will be the Sony PXW-X70 Professional Hand Held Camcorder or similar
  • Two wireless microphones (e.g, the Sennheiser EK 500 G4)
  • Two camera tripod stands
  • A videography lighting kit (Comes with fluorescent bulbs, a backdrop, and umbrella reflectors)
  • Access to content editing software (e.g. Adobe Creative Cloud

 

What we are offering in exchange:

Pledged Amount                                       Perks Offered:

$150                                                      Free Course Creation Consultation/Needs Assessment

$150                                                      5% Off Online Course Hosting Subscription

$250                                                      5% Off Course Creation Coupon

$300                                                     10% Off Online Course Hosting Subscription

$500                                                     10% Off Course Creation Coupon

$750                                                      15% Off Online Course Hosting Subscription

$1000                                                    15% Off Course Creation Coupon

$1500                                                    20% Off Online Course Hosting Subscription

$2000                                                   20% Off Course Creation Coupon

 

The Impact

Analysts estimate that total losses due to the corona virus will eclipse 4 trillion dollars in revenue, which translates to nearly 80 million jobs in the US economy being at high or moderate risk, as per Moody's Analytics. That's more than half of the 153 million jobs in the economy overall.

While all these jobs may not necessarily be lost, it's probable that as many as 10 million of those workers could see some impact to their paychecks -- either layoffs, furloughs, fewer hours or wage cuts.

Your support will enable us to provide small and mid-sized business across the nation with a low cost alternative for digitizing their training to either utilize this downtime to upskill their workforce or transition their employees to working remotely.

 

Risks & Challenges

There is a probability that we may not reach our intended fundraising goal. If that is the case, we will buy the equipment we can with the amount raised, and continue to supplement it with our internal funds as we go. Your support would enable us to serve more customers more quickly.

As the restrictions continue, the demand could even increase further, in which case we would use the funds raised from other work to purchase more equipment.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

First, we would like you help spread the word to other small businesses that you think could benefit from our services. Second, we would like you to support and share our campaign via email and with your followers on social media, perhaps they would know someone in need. Thank you for helping up support small and mid-sized businesses redefine how they learn.

story:
Village Box Café Bar & Grill

The un-ordinary bar and grill.

Village Box Café Bar & Grill or “The Box,” is the ultimate dining experience. A full-service restaurant, bar, grill and events venue space sure to delight.

A new way to dine and entertain, consisting of an in-house branded “bar & grill,” themed events, lounges and bars, comedy and dance nights.

We offer such events as our highly anticipated “Food Bar,” held nightly on the Box patio from 5-9 pm. From Taco night, to Soulfood, Pasta and Asian cuisine for $10.00 per person this hits the spot. Happy hour couldn’t be any happier.

This modern, yet stylish and happening restaurant features three (3) areas of dining and entertainment space.

From our main restaurant which features a 200-person dining room complete with a walk-up bar and flat screen TV’s for your enjoyment. To our signature indoor performance stage for dine in entertainment.

Our second dining experience leads you to our “signature” outdoor patio known as “The Box.” Private cabanas, an open air “beer box,” covered and open-air dining, and 24 flat screens TV’s so you’ll never miss a game or that special event. A stylish, upbeat environment awaits you at the patio Box.

Our third dining experience leads you to our rooftop terrace which comes with rooftop seating, a walk-up bar, flat screen TV’s, and our signature dance floor open every Friday and Saturday nights.

From live cooking demonstrations, to weekend brunch with bottomless mimosas, to private cabanas, foodbars and more await you at The Box.

While were working hard to provide the ultimate dining experience our mission wouldn’t be complete without your generous contributions.

As a new entry into the hospitality and entertainment sector, Village Box Café Bar & Grill with the contributions of our supporters hope to secure funding to complete our planning and engineering phase.

We are seeking an initial contribution of $50,000 that would be used for the purpose of architectural and engineering blueprints, administrative cost and the conduct of a feasibility study for the City.

Contributing to this campaign would allow us to complete our development plans and move into construction, thus offering you, our guest, the ultimate dining experience, sooner.

For your generous donations we’ve assembled a worthwhile list of Perks.

The Company intends to produce a book with the history of Village Box Café Bar & Grill and the construction and investment process. Following the restaurants opening, construction and writing of the book, this perk will be made available to its contributors. 

The Company will provide the following (“perks”) to contributors in this Offering, at each level of contribution defined below.

From the Box to the Box Elite we have you covered.

1.  From $0 to $50 dollars The Box.  3 of 10 perks received.

2.  From $50 to $100 dollars The Box Limited.  4 of 10 perks received.

3.  From $100 to $500 dollars The Box Plus.  5 of 10 perks received.

4.  From $500 to $1000 dollars The Box Supreme.  6 of 10 perks received.

5.  From $1000 and ABOVE The Box Elite.  ALL PERKS RECEIVED.

Our list of Perks.

1.  Limited edition T-Shirt.

2.  Limited edition travel mug.

3.  Limited edition poster.

4.  Limited edition cookbook.

5.  Limited edition documentary book.

6.  Two (2) free drinks.

7.  Two (2) free drinks plus appetizers.

8.  Name published in book. (With your permission).

9.  Launch party news letter featuring all contributors names.

10.  Tickets to pre grand opening event. A red carpet event.

And a bonus of 10% off meals for each donor for a year.

Village Box Café Bar & Grill is owned and operated by Village Box Café LLC, a California limited liability company. Its CEO, Oliver B. Mitchell III, has well over 30 years in corporate retail, government and entertainment industry experience.

The Mission Statement of Village Box Café LLC is to provide “the ultimate dining experience” and with your contributions we will fulfill our mission.

Welcome to the ultimate dining experience. Welcome to Village Box Café Bar & Grill.

FYI, in the event you may not be able to contribute will you please help us spread the word and pass this campaign to a friend or place on your social media page?

Thank you for your interest in Village Box Café Bar & Grill.

ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. COPYRIGHT 2020.

VILLAGE BOX CAFÉ LLC

Corporate Headquarters

355 S. Grand Ave., Suite 2450

Los Angeles, California

90071

Mailing Address

300 Long Beach Blvd., Unit 754

Long Beach, California

90801

MEDIA INQUIRIES: OLIVER@VILLAGEBOXCAFE.COM

Contributing to this campaign would allow us to complete our development plans and move into construction, thus offering you, our guest, the ultimate dining experience, sooner.
For your generous donations we’ve assembled a worthwhile list of Perks.
The Company intends to produce a book with the history of Village Box Café Bar & Grill and the construction and investment process. Following the restaurants opening, construction and writing of the book, this perk will be made available to its contributors. 
The Company will provide the following (“perks”) to contributors in this Offering, at each level of contribution defined below.
From the Box to the Box Elite we have you covered.
1.  From $0 to $50 dollars The Box.  3 of 10 perks received.
2.  From $50 to $100 dollars The Box Limited.  4 of 10 perks received.
3.  From $100 to $500 dollars The Box Plus.  5 of 10 perks received.
4.  From $500 to $1000 dollars The Box Supreme.  6 of 10 perks received.
5.  From $1000 and ABOVE The Box Elite.  ALL PERKS RECEIVED.
Our list of Perks.
1.  Limited edition T-Shirt.
2.  Limited edition travel mug.
3.  Limited edition poster.
4.  Limited edition cookbook.
5.  Limited edition documentary book.
6.  Two (2) free drinks.
7.  Two (2) free drinks plus appetizers.
8.  Name published in book. (With your permission).
9.  Launch party news letter featuring all contributors names.
10.  Tickets to pre grand opening event. A red carpet event.
And a bonus of 10% off meals for each donor for a year.
Village Box Café Bar & Grill is owned and operated by Village Box Café LLC, a California limited liability company. Its CEO, Oliver B. Mitchell III, has well over 30 years in corporate retail, government and entertainment industry experience.
The Mission Statement of Village Box Café LLC is to provide “the ultimate dining experience” and with your contributions we will fulfill our mission.
Welcome to the ultimate dining experience. Welcome to Village Box Café Bar & Grill.
FYI, in the event you may not be able to contribute will you please help us spread the word and pass this campaign to a friend or place on your social media page?
Thank you for your interest in Village Box Café Bar & Grill.
ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. COPYRIGHT 2020.
VILLAGE BOX CAFÉ LLC
Corporate Headquarters
355 S. Grand Ave., Suite 2450
Los Angeles, California
90071
Mailing Address
300 Long Beach Blvd., Unit 754
Long Beach, California
90801
MEDIA INQUIRIES: OLIVER@VILLAGEBOXCAFE.COM

story:
Kansas City has seen incredible growth in the last several years, especially in historical neighborhoods like the Crossroads, River Market, and Downtown. We are striving to open a hookah lounge in River Market. River Market is a densely packed neighborhood with old historic buildings and the charm and character that comes with it, it is less than a quarter of a square mile and anchored by the largest farmers market in KC and the Steamboat Arabia Museum. We see this neighborhood as a vital part of the KC experience, and we want to be a part of this. Currently we have the light rail scheduled to go live in summer of 2016 which runs a 2 mile course, starting at one end at Union Station, then Crossroads, Downtown, and finally ending in the heart of River Market. River Market is going to be greatly benefited by this light rail as there will be a diaspora of residents from other neighborhoods able to travel to this neighborhood without having to get in their car and drive, plus residents in this neighborhood will benefit from an increase in walkability in the general area as more and more businesses have opened due to the light rail. This neighborhood is becoming more of the livable neighborhood that residents need and want... there is a plethora of restaurants and shopping, as well as service retailers at the fingertips of residents but we found that there are few entertainment destinations and no hookah lounges in this neighborhood. People need places to unwind, socialize, and just have a good time. We aim to provide customers with the highest quality hookah experience possible and fill a need and want in this neighborhood. Our concept consists of the following:

*We are going to be half coffee shop, half hookah lounge. We plan to locally source our coffee blends from The Roasterie, a Kansas City icon. Our teas are going to be flavorful whole leaf, organic in flavors such as Jasmine, Green Tea, and Chai. We will have a large array of high quality food products and drink products for every palate.

*Our hookahs will be top of the line glass and stainless steel hookahs which eliminate a chemical taste and offer the purest and smoothest smoke possible. With our glass hookahs we will offer fruit infusions that offer a visual display that complements the flavor of the tobacco. Everything from the natural coals, premium shisha, top of the line hookahs, the way we expertly prepare your hookah is done to ensure you have the highest quality smoking experience. 

*We will offer a large variety of flavors from a number of premium tobacco companies such as Fumari, Starbuzz, and Hookafina, there will be a flavor for everyone. 

*Free WiFi and a casual and comfortable interior with soothing qualities will make our customers feel like they can unwind and let the worries of their day melt away.

*Hookah has been a social activity for hundreds of years and we want to stay true to that tradition, we will makes sure our music is chill yet compelling, and never too loud or the kind you would dance to at a club. Monthly events will offer chances to network, make new friends, and enjoy new flavors.

*Excellent customer service is another very important pillar of our concept. There is nothing like entering a place that truly cares about what you want. Whether our customers use our spot to study, socialize, or network, we will be there to make sure that they are happy with their experience. A friendly smile, attentive staff, a willingness to go the extra mile and keep up with what our customers wants is the cornerstone to our customer service. When you leave our lounge we want you to see us as the best and only option for hookah in KC!

story:
Support our Kanji House!


1. Who we are

We are a university student group in Japan. Members who share the same view set up Kanji House to introduce Japanese traditional culture to people from all over the world. 


2.  Our vision

  • We aim to introduce Japanese traditional culture widely.
  • We aim to reduce conflicts between people from other culture or background by communication with and understanding.
  • We aim to establish network all over the world by using Kanji House as a hub.



3.  Our Activities  -What is Kanji House?

Kanji House is a place to achieve our vision. Currently you can have an experience to enjoy traditional Japan. 

Kanji House is situated in Asakusa, Tokyo, Japan. Asakusa is well known as an area which retains Japanese tradition and culture as well as a sightseeing area that 40,000,000 people visit every year. 

At Kanji House we will create your Kanji name based on what you tell us such as your personality. Then we will write your Kanji name in Japanese calligraphy. 

Kanji House staff wearing Kimono, Japanese traditional costume will welcome you in a room decorated in Japanese traditional style. Our specially trained concierge will translate your name into Kanji name, then write it in Shodo (Japanese calligraphy), for you to take home!


a). Our unique method how to create Kanji name.

You will tell us about yourself such as your personality, hobbies etc. We will create your Kanji name based on what you tell us. Kanji (Chinese characters) have a lots of meanings. 



For example  Michael, whose name is pronounced "maikl," likes dancing will give us an image that “he is living with bright and glamorous world.  He has a free spirit,” and as an extra information, “he is living near the river.” So we created his Kanji name as below.  




b). Shodo calligrapher Kanji Artist 

What is the Shodo? Please see this.



c).Hand in Kanji name we create for you

We will give you a piece of paper that explains meaning about Kanji characters used for your name.





Kakejiku (Hanging scroll)   Small


Kakejiku (Hanging scroll)  Large



d). Picture frames and Furoshiki to purchase at Kanji House.

Furoshiki is Japanese traditional clothes for wrapping. You can use Furoshiki as many as you like not like wrapping paper. Furoshiki is eco-friendly culture that Japan can be proud of. You can wrap any kind of shape object by Furoshiki.






Framed Kanji name image


wall hanging





e). Kompeito for a souvenir at Kanji House!

Kompeito is one of the most popular souvenirs in Asakusa. Kompeito is Japanese traditional candies which you can purchase only in Japan. They are very beautiful and looks elegant because of their colorful looks. 

You can eat or put a pinch of it into champagne or sparkling wine. Kompeito into the drinks is perfectly matched and the taste is slightly sweet, so it's very tasty. We promise you will be popular if you bring Kompeito to a party.





4. Current Situation

Because we are students, we did not have enough funds to be rented Kanji House by a main street. Currently Kanji House is situated by a side road which is not easy to be found by passersby.  

Nor we are not able to afford for advertising costs. Currently we only rely on Tripadviser. Unfortunately, the average visitors are around three people a day. Either we find someone on main streets nearby or people who found us by Tripadvisor visited Kanji House. 

It is hard to keep Kanji House with only three visitors a day. With this situation, it is difficult to not only expand but also even continue to open Kanji House. One day we will graduate our university. Under this tough situation, we will not be able to become full time workers as Kanji House does not make any profit at this stage. 


5. Why we need your help and support

We need your support to keep our Kanji House open. Our main purpose of this fundraising is for Kanji House advertising and our website service to increase visitors and customers.

Although Kanji House got the number one ranking of Asakusa area of TripAdviser, daily visitors are only three as we said. We would like to more people to know and visit Kanji House to feel traditional Japanese world. Please read comments from TripAdviser so that you can find our passion.

>>Kanji House TripAdviser  



a). Street signs

We would like to set up street signs so that more people will be able to find Kanji House easily. Street signs will increase the chance for people, who do not see any information on the Internet, to find Kanji House. The place we are hoping to set up the signs are indicated as A, B and C on the map below.

We have been given the following quotation.

・￥40,000 ($300-400)/month x 3 places x 3 months    

Total ￥360,000 ($3,000-3,600)

 We hope we will increase visitors in these three months to run Kanji House more steadily.


b). Kanji House Website and merchandise products

We are hoping to built up Kanji House Web site that our visitors requested. In order to achieve this, we need funds to establish EC sites. We have been given the following quotation.

Total cost for new EC site implementation $7,400-9,000 approximately

・System design  ￥180,000 ($1,500-1,800) for PC site

・System design ￥70,000 ($570-700) for Smartphone site

・Coding ￥60,000 ($480-600)

・Magento EC site system implementation ￥600,000 ($4,900-6,000)

Cost to purchase equipments to produce merchandise products $1,600-2,000 approximately

・Kanji House original T-shirts (T-shirts printed with Kanji) maker ￥100,000 ($800-1,000)

・Kanji House original plate (a plate printed with Kanji) maker ￥100,000($800-1,000)


In the Web service, we are planning to offer same service to crete Kanji names by using Skype. After chatting, we will create your Kanji name and send your Kanji name written by professional shodo calligrapher within one day via Skype. 


If you like your Kanji name, you will be able to order a frame to hang your Kanji name or Kanji House original products with your Kanji name printed.

For example,
・Kanji name in Japanese paper＆Forehead＆How to use Furoshiki paper
・Kanji name in　Kompeito
・T-shirts 
・tote bags
・dishes 
・mug cups 
etc.

T-shirts

Kanji Japanese paper＆Forehead＆How to use Furoshiki paper


We believe if this fund raising succeed, we are able to run Kanji House steadily which will lead Kanji House to expand for the future.

Thank you for your reading our appeal and your support in advance.



Perks

①

$8USD

Make your own Kanji Name

You will tell us about yourself such as your personality, hobbies etc. on a form. We will create your Kanji name based on what you tell us, and our professional caligrapher will write your Kanji name in Japanese calligraphy. We will send you

 ・the picture of your Kanji name

 ・the data that explains meaning about Kanji characters used for your name

 to your email address.



②

$15USD

Make your Kanji Name on Skype

You will tell us about yourself such as your personality, hobbies etc. on a form. We will create your Kanji name based on what you tell us, and our professional caligrapher will write your Kanji name in Japanese calligraphy. We will send you

 ・the picture of your framed Kanji name 

・the data that explains meaning about Kanji characters used for your name to your email address.



③

$20USD + Shipping

Framed Kanji Name

You will tell us about yourself such as your personality, hobbies etc. on Skype. We will create your Kanji name based on what you tell us, and our professional caligrapher will write your Kanji name in Japanese calligraphy.

 You can see the performance on Skype. 

It takes about 20 minutes overall. We will send you 

・your framed Kanji name 

・the paper that explains meaning about Kanji characters used for your name to your address.


④

Ships Worldwide

$35USD + Shipping

Standard Course

You will tell us about yourself such as your personality, hobbies etc. on Skype. We will create your Kanji name based on what you tell us, and our professional caligrapher will write your Kanji name in Japanese calligraphy. 

You can see the performance on Skype. It takes about 20 minutes overall. 

We will send you

 ・your framed Kanji name

 ・the paper that explains meaning about Kanji characters used for your name

 ・Furoshiki that wraps the frame to your address.




⑤

Ships Worldwide

$43USD + Shipping

Standard Course & Kompeito

You will tell us about yourself such as your personality, hobbies etc. on Skype. We will create your Kanji name based on what you tell us, and our professional caligrapher will write your Kanji name in Japanese calligraphy.

 You can see the performance on Skype. It takes about 20 minutes overall. 

We also write your Kanji name on the bottle of Kompeito. 

We will send you 

・the content of Standard Course 

・original Kompeito, Japanese traditional candies, 

with your Kanji name to your address.



⑥

Ships Worldwide

$65USD + Shipping

Framed Kanji Name & T-shirt

You will tell us about yourself such as your personality, hobbies etc. on Skype. We will create your Kanji name based on what you tell us, and our professional caligrapher will write your Kanji name in Japanese calligraphy. 

You can see the performance on Skype. It takes about 20 minutes overall. 

We also make a T-shirt of your Kanji name. We will send you

・your framed Kanji name 

・original T-shirt with your Kanji name to your address.




⑦

Ships Worldwide

$65USD + Shipping

Couple Course

You will tell us about yourself such as your personality, hobbies etc. on Skype.

 We will create your Kanji name based on what you tell us, and our professional caligrapher will write your Kanji name in Japanese calligraphy.

 You can see the performance on Skype. 

It takes about 30 minutes overall. 

We will send you the content of Standard Course for 2 names to your address.


⑧

$80USD + Shipping

We will create your Kanji name based on what you tell us, and our professional caligrapher will write your Kanji name in Japanese calligraphy. 

You can see the performance on Skype. 

It takes about 20 minutes overall. 

We also make a T-shirt of your Kanji name. 

We will send you 

・the content of Standard Course 

・original T-shirt with your Kanji name to your address.



⑨

Ships Worldwide

$90USD + Shipping

Family Course (for 3 Names)

You will tell us about yourself such as your personality, hobbies etc. on Skype. 

We will create your Kanji name based on what you tell us, and our professional caligrapher will write your Kanji name in Japanese calligraphy.

 You can see the performance on Skype.

 It takes about 30 minutes overall. 

We will send you the content of Standard Course for 3 names to your address.


⑩

Ships Worldwide

$115USD + Shipping

Family Course (for 4 Names)

You will tell us about yourself such as your personality, hobbies etc. on Skype. 

We will create your Kanji name based on what you tell us, and our professional caligrapher will write your Kanji name in Japanese calligraphy.

 You can see the performance on Skype. 

It takes about 30 minutes overall.

 We will send you the content of Standard Course for 4 names to your address.


⑪

Ships Worldwide

$120USD + Shipping

Standard Course & Kakejuku

You will tell us about yourself such as your personality, hobbies etc. on Skype.

 We will create your Kanji name based on what you tell us, and our professional caligrapher will write your Kanji name in Japanese calligraphy, on a Japanese paper and big Kakejuku, hanging scroll. 

You can see the performance on Skype.

 It takes about 30 minutes overall. We will send you

 ・the content of Standard Course

 ・Kakejuku, Hanging scroll with your Kanji name to your address.

・original T-shirt with your Kanji name to your address.




⑨
Ships Worldwide
$90USD + Shipping
Family Course (for 3 Names)
You will tell us about yourself such as your personality, hobbies etc. on Skype. 
We will create your Kanji name based on what you tell us, and our professional caligrapher will write your Kanji name in Japanese calligraphy.
 You can see the performance on Skype.
 It takes about 30 minutes overall. 
We will send you the content of Standard Course for 3 names to your address.

⑩

⑪

Standard Course & Kakejuku
You will tell us about yourself such as your personality, hobbies etc. on Skype.

 It takes about 30 minutes overall. We will send you
 ・the content of Standard Course
 ・Kakejuku, Hanging scroll with your Kanji name to your address.

story:
»Drucksack« - Deine textile Siebdruckerei

Patrick und Patrick wollen siebdrucken!

Im Herzen Berlins - okay, etwas nördlich ist es schon - liegt die ehemalige »Willner Brauerei Berlin«. Auf dem Gelände befindet sich die kleine aber feine Werkstatt, die auf uns wartet.

Unsere Idee umfasst einen Gedanken und den kleinen Traum eines Freundes. Diesen Traum möchten wir gerne aufblühen lassen:

  • Verzierung durch Siebdruck von Textilien, wie T-Shirts, Zipper, Jutebeutel, u.a.
  • Merchandise-Service für Musiker/Bands (für New-Comer und Alte Hasen)
  • Durchführung von Schulprojekten im Bereich Siebdruck

Unternehmerisch würde man sagen: »Drucksack« bedruckt ökologisch einwandfrei und sozialverträglich hergestellte Textilien - zum einen Auftragsarbeiten für Unternehmen, Vereine und Verbände, zum anderen für das/die eigens entstehende Label/Marke »Drucksack«.

Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

Wir sind für die Verwirklichung gerade auf jeden Cent angewiesen. Das Geld fließt direkt in die Werkstatt:

  • Übernahme der vorhandenen Technik
  • Neukauf von Computertechnik
  • Neukauf von Textilien und Farbe für den Start
  • Marketingausgaben für bunte Flyer

Wir haben für jeden Euro ein kleines Paket, von Shirts über Rabatte bishin zu Teilhaberanteile. Einfach in der Liste vorbeischauen, oder uns kontaktieren.

Wer braucht »Drucksack«

Wir! Und natürlich unsere Freunde, Bands, Unternehmen, Vereine und Verbände. Bedruckte Textilien sind gefragt und auch für den kleinen Geldbeutel gibt es gute Qualität. Es muss nicht immer eine große Stückzahl sein und vor allem muss es nicht immer ein Online-Portal sein, ohne persönlichen Kontakt.

  • Wir planen mit euch das Design
  • Wir planen mit euch den gewünschten Bedarf
  • Wir liefern zeitnah eure Wünsche

Auch wollen wir unser soziales Engagement mit unserer Siebdruckerei verbinden. Schüllerinnen und Schüler bekommen einen Einblick in das Handwerk und können ihre Ideen umsetzen. Und warum nicht mal ein Kindergeburtstag in gemütlicher Athmosphäre? Ein Erlebnis für alle ist garantiert.

Risiken & Herausforderungen

Die Überschrift haben wir mal so stehen lassen. Denn natürlich gibt es auch diese, der Markt hat Bedarf und die Herausforderung besteht darin günstig, schnell und vor allem kompetent diesen zu befriedigen.

  • Mit dem richtigen Marketing und der richtigen PR geben wir »Drucksack« den nötigen Auftritt. Vitamin B ist natürlich immer willkommen.
  • Das größte Risiko kann natürlich eine Pleite sein, aber mal ehrlich, jedes Projekt hat genau dieses Risiko und als Jungunternehmer träumt man mindestens zweimal die Woche davon, also warum darüber reden? Wir powern ja nicht unsere Zweifel sondern nutzen unsere Power!

Wer wir sind

Das geht kurz und knapp:

  • Patrick Koschinsky, Siebdrucker
  • Patrick Rupprecht, Kaufmann

Das war es auch schon.

Bei weiteren Fragen könnt ihr uns gerne kontaktieren: pat.rupprecht@gmail.com

Wir werden unterstützt vom Grafikbüro "Revolver Studios".

story:
What is oriolus?

Oriolus is a simple, computer monitor mounted device for displaying your computers processor and RAM load in a simple, direct and easy to read manner. The name comes from Sebastjan’s last name, which is Slovenian for a small colorful bird from the Oriolus family. 
We hope to expand the different data our little box can display to things like frames per second, latency to remote locations/servers, hard drive load, hard drive free to used disc space ratio and various temperatures. You can join us on our last steps of development on our forums.


Oriolus naked

The naked version consists of a complete working Oriolus without the casing. You still get all the essentials but with an opportunity to make your own personalized casing or incorporating Oriolus into an already existing project or a custom built pc. In the package you will receive both analog gauges, circuit board, software and the usb cable.


It does look good!

With its sleek design and its vintage looking gauges it will spice up any workstation or gaming station. The size is just right for any desk environment. If you do not want the full version you can also choose the version without the case so you can use them for example modding your pc case or making a custom Oriolus case.


How it works

Oriolus works by simply connecting a standard USB cable and running our utility on your computer. The utility then checks if everything is in order and starts processing data, which is then sent to Oriolus. It then crunches some numbers and displays the proper values.

If there is no data sent over from your pc however, Oriolus gets bored and starts waving its little gauge arms back and forth in a screensaver-ish manner. Do you need any drivers you ask? Well, no, you don’t. It just works.


Where will all the funding go?

The first 25.000$ is there for the sole purpose of getting Oriolus of the ground. It is the money we need to further develop, test, build and ship Oriolus on a larger scale. Rest of the funding will go towards our stretch goals, providing more customization and hopefully a lower price point in the near future.


Stretch goals

  • 50.000$ - LOCKED  
                  More colors, we will pick the colors that users want the most and you will                       be able to choose from that pallet (around 5 colors)

  • 100.000$ - LOCKED
                 new casing, new gauges, all developed with the community’s input


Reviews

Kitguru made a review of Oriolus!

Check it out ON THIS LINK


Timeline of our project



Production

We have contacted our manufacturer and they are the best and most trusted in our country. We will test the quality of the product so your Oriolus will arrive in perfect working order! We have investigated and secured logistics partners needed for safe and fast worldwide delivery.


Delivery

Oriolus will ship approximately May 2015. We will keep you posted on everything there will be happening along the way, no surprises or hidden changes.  


Shipping

Shipping inside the EU is free. However if you are shipping your Oriolus outside of the European Union please add the 10$ perk to help us cover the cost of shipping. Thank you.

story:
Old booking systems are expensive? #PreBooking is the answer!

Rome is one of the world's most visited cities and the average hotel cost here with standard booking systems is 145€ per night! Wow, that's pretty expensive! 

That’s why we’re introducing #PreBooking, the World's Smartest Way To Visit Rome starting from 145€ 35$ per night.

How it works    

  • Pick your perk 
  • Just Relax: we'll buy, renovate and furnish an apartment in the center of Rome for you (scheduled completion date: July 1, 2016)
  • Finalize Your Booking (on website or mobile app)
  • Enjoy Rome!


What we need  

During the last year we have already identified which homes for sale are most suitable for our project, and evaluated the most efficient and reliable suppliers experienced in hospitality projects (architects, interior designers and property renovation companies). Now, we need your help to take the next step. 
Your prebookings will allow us to buy, renovate and furnish the apartment in Rome's central area, where we will offer our funders free accommodation.

What you get    

FREE accommodation in an ideal position for visiting Rome.

Simple. Realistic. 100% Risk-free (if we don’t reach our Goal, all contributions will be refunded by Indiegogo).


Price Comparison: Standard Booking VS #PreBooking


The Apartment


Floor plan idea


Location

The apartment will be located in the center of Rome, 100 meters from Manzoni Subway Station (Metro A) and from a bus that goes to the Colosseum, Imperial Fora and City Center. The Colosseum will be at most 1km away (10min walking) and St. John Lateran Basilica will be 500 meters away.


The rooms

Your comfort can't be measured, but here are some numbers:
- Double Room: 14 m2 (1 large double bed) + Bathroom 3,5 m2 

- Triple Room: 19 m2 (1 large double bed + 1 large single bed) + Bathroom 3,5 m2

All rooms will have the following amenities:

Extremely fresh&clean rooms is our mission, guaranteed by the frequency and accuracy of our room cleaning service: Room+bathroom will be cleaned for each new funder. Also bedding+towels will be changed for each new funder (and if you stay longer than a week, they will be changed at least twice a week). 

We want our rooms to be as eco-friendly, sustainable and allergy free as possible. Here are some of the key points:

  1. No Fitted Carpet + No Wallpaper = Less Dust
  2. Microfiber pillow cases and mattress covers, to eliminate dust and dander associated with bedding
  3. Non-smoking rooms
  4. Natural Soaps
  5. Sanitized heater and air conditioner
  6. Steam Cleaning
  7. LED illumination


Timeline



Perks: This is how we say "Grazie" (Thank you)

Early Bird Phase

One of us - 15$

Every little bit helps! You’ll get an exclusive 20% lifetime discount (on our future standard rate) for being part of the team. Please note that discounts cannot be combined.

Double Room - 35$

One free night in Double Room with private bathroom.

Sparkling Double Room - 45$

One free night in Double Room with private bathroom and welcome drink (Italian dry sparkling wine).

Triple Room - 55$

One free night in Triple Room with private bathroom.

Double Room - 3 days - 70$

2 free nights in Double Room with private bathroom.

Triple Room - 3 days - 110$

2 free nights in Triple Room with private bathroom.

Double Room - 7 days - 210$

6 free nights in Double Room with private bathroom.

Triple Room - 7 days - 330$

6 free nights in Triple Room with private bathroom.

Name a Chair - 399$

Each of the 12 seats in the apartment is available for sponsorship.

Name a Room - 4000$

An elegant wooden name-plate will be affixed on the door of each room. Personalization options include: font and any text you wish to get engraved (size is fixed). Each of the 6 rooms in the apartment is available for sponsorship.

I See You - 5000$

An image of your choice will be attached to the wall of the corridor, so that every guest will see it.

As Seen On TV - 5000$

An image of your choice will be shown every time one of the TVs will be switched on. Each of the 6 TVs in the apartment is available for sponsorship.

Baptism - 90k

You can choose the name of the apartment. Take advantage of the opportunity to have your name (or the name of a loved one) become a permanent part of the Eternal City.


Comparison: Standard Booking VS #PreBooking 



Help Us, Share And Win!


 

Distances from the apartment


St. John Lateran Basilica: 5min

It is the oldest and ranks first among the five Papal Basilicas of the world and the four Major Basilicas of Rome (all of which are also Papal basilicas).



Colosseum: 10min

The Colosseum or Coliseum, also known as the Flavian Amphitheatre , is an oval amphitheatre in the centre of the city of Rome, Italy. It is the largest amphitheatre ever built and is considered one of the greatest works of architecture and engineering.


Imperial Fora - Altare Della Patria - Termini Train Station: 15min

The Imperial Fora (Fori Imperiali in Italian) are a series of monumental fora constructed in Rome over a period of one and a half centuries. The forums were the center of the Roman Republic and of the Roman Empire.


Trevi Fountain: 30min walking (or 10min by Bus)

The Trevi Fountain (Italian: Fontana di Trevi) is the largest Baroque fountain in the city and one of the most famous fountains in the world! The fountain has appeared in several notable films, including Federico Fellini's La Dolce Vita.


St. Peter's Basilica : 15min by Subway (Metro A)

St. Peter's Basilica (Italian: Basilica Papale di San Pietro in Vaticano), is a Late Renaissance church located within Vatican City. Designed by Donato Bramante, Michelangelo, Carlo Maderno and Gian Lorenzo Bernini, St. Peter's is one of the two largest churches in the world.


Pantheon: 15min by Bus (line 51 - 85)

The Pantheon is one of the best-preserved of all Ancient Roman buildings. It has been in continuous use throughout its history, and since the 7th century, the Pantheon has been used as a church dedicated to "St. Mary and the Martyrs".


Piazza Navona: 20min by Bus (line 51 - 85)

Piazza Navona is a piazza in Rome, Italy. The ancient Romans went there to watch the agones ("games"), and hence it was known as "Circus Agonalis" ("competition arena"). 


FAQ


Why #PreBooking?

We live in one of the most beautiful cities of the World and want to share it with you. We want to share the moment when you realize that old online booking systems are obsolete, and that #PreBooking is a reality.


Who are you?

Marco / 35 years old / likes: gardening, cycling and ‘60s music.

Stefano / 34 years old / likes: photography, adventure and indie music.

We both work in the ICT Industry and love to travel as much as we can to explore and experience different cultures, meet new people and be open to change our perspective.


When can I come to Rome?

You can come to visit us starting from July 1, 2016.

A website and a mobile APP to check the availability of the rooms will be online on April 1, 2016, so that you can let us know when you want to come to Rome.

Is my PreBooking valid per person or per room?

The PreBooking is valid per room (double or triple room, depending on the chosen perk).

Will the rooms be shared or private?

If you PreBook now, you will get a private room with private bathroom.


Will there be an elevator in the building?

Yes, an elevator will be available.


Will Wi-Fi be available in the room?

WiFi will be available free of charge in all rooms of the apartment.


Will the apartment be suitable for English speakers?

Yes, our team will be able to speak both Italian and English.


What time is check-in?

Our standard check-in time will be from 4 pm. If, however, you are arriving earlier you are welcome to come in and drop your bags off with us. 


Is there an extra fee for a late arrival?

No, there will be no additional fee for late arrivals.


What time is check-out?

Check out time will be no later than 10 am. However, your luggage may be left to be picked up later in the day.


Will pets be allowed?

No, pets will not be allowed.

Do you offer smoking rooms?

No, all our rooms will be non-smoking.


Do you offer handicapped rooms?

We are sorry, but they will not be available in the starting phase of our campaign.


Can I finalize my PreBooking at any time?

Your PreBooking will never expire, and you can finalize your PreBooking starting from April 1, 2016.  


Can I change or cancel my reservation?

Yes, you will be able to change or cancel your reservation up to 7 days before your arrival using the website or mobile APP.


What should I do if I lost or forgot something in my room?

Please contact us by e-mail directly. If you lose or forget something inside the room it will be found by our housekeeping team.


Can I read the comments by the other funders?

Yes, there will be a "Leave your comment" area on our website (and mobile APP) where you can read feedbacks about the location, rooms, etc.


Is the flight to Rome included?

No, your travel expenses are not included. 


What is the source of your data?

Average Daily Rate: "European cities hotel forecast for 2015 and 2016 - PwC"


How else can I contribute?

If you can't give us any financial help you can still SHARE our story!

  • Share our campaign using Indiegogo's share tools!

  • Like us on Facebook

  • Follow us on Twitter

  • Send us an email with your ideas

  • Meet us in Rome


What if my question isn’t answered here?

We’re happy to respond to any other queries you might have about #PreBooking, the Indiegogo campaign, and our team as a whole. Email us at MyDreamYourReality at gmail.com


#PreBook now, make it happen!

St. Peter's Basilica (Italian: Basilica Papale di San Pietro in Vaticano), is a Late Renaissance church located within Vatican City. Designed by Donato Bramante, Michelangelo, Carlo Maderno and Gian Lorenzo Bernini, St. Peter's is one of the two largest churches in the world.


Pantheon: 15min by Bus (line 51 - 85)


The Pantheon is one of the best-preserved of all Ancient Roman buildings. It has been in continuous use throughout its history, and since the 7th century, the Pantheon has been used as a church dedicated to "St. Mary and the Martyrs".


Piazza Navona: 20min by Bus (line 51 - 85)


Piazza Navona is a piazza in Rome, Italy. The ancient Romans went there to watch the agones ("games"), and hence it was known as "Circus Agonalis" ("competition arena"). 



FAQ


Why #PreBooking?

We live in one of the most beautiful cities of the World and want to share it with you. We want to share the moment when you realize that old online booking systems are obsolete, and that #PreBooking is a reality. 

Who are you?
Marco / 35 years old / likes: gardening, cycling and ‘60s music.
Stefano / 34 years old / likes: photography, adventure and indie music.
We both work in the ICT Industry and love to travel as much as we can to explore and experience different cultures, meet new people and be open to change our perspective.



When can I come to Rome?
You 
can come to visit us starting from July 1,  2016. A website and a mobile APP to check the availability of the rooms will be online on April 1, 2016, so that you can let us know when you want to come to Rome.

Is my PreBooking valid per person or per room? 
The PreBooking is valid per room (double or triple room, depending on the chosen perk). Will the rooms be shared or private? If you PreBook now, you will get a private room with private bathroom.
Will there be an elevator in the building?

Yes, an elevator will be available.


Will Wi-Fi be available in the room?
WiFi will be available free of charge in all rooms of the apartment.

Will the apartment be suitable for English speakers?
Yes, our team will be able to speak both Italian and English. 

What time is check-in?
Our standard check-in time will be from 4 pm. If, however, you are arriving earlier you are welcome to come in and drop your bags off 
with us. 


Is there an extra fee for a late arrival? 
No, there will be no additional fee for late arrivals.
What time is check-out?
Check out time will be no later than 10 am. However, your luggage may be left to be picked up later in the day. 

Will pets be allowed?
No, pets will not be allowed.

Do you offer smoking rooms?
No, all our rooms will be non-smoking.

Do you offer handicapped rooms?
We are sorry, but they will not be available in the starting phase of our campaign. 

Can I finalize my PreBooking at any time?
Your PreBooking will never expire, and you can finalize your PreBooking starting from April 1, 2016.  


Can I change or cancel my reservation?
Yes, you will be able to change or cancel your reservation up to 7 days before your arrival using the website or mobile APP.
What should I do if I lost or forgot something in my room?
Please contact us by e-mail directly. If you lose or forget something inside the room it will be found by our housekeeping team.
Can I read the comments by the other funders? 

Yes, there will be a "Leave your comment" area on our website (and mobile APP) where you can read feedbacks about the location, rooms, etc. 
Is the flight to Rome included?No, your travel expenses are not included. 

What is the source of your data?Average Daily Rate: "European cities hotel forecast for 2015 and 2016 - PwC"
How else can I contribute?
If you can't give us any financial help you can still SHARE our story!

Share our campaign using Indiegogo's share tools!
Like us on Facebook
Follow us on Twitter
Send us an email with your ideas
Meet us in Rome

What if my question isn’t answered here?
We’re happy to respond to any other queries you might have about #PreBooking, the Indiegogo campaign, and our team as a whole. Email us at MyDreamYourReality at gmail.com
#PreBook now, make it happen!

story:
WHAT IS CELEBREAK?

CeleBreak is a travel, football and nightlife experience spanning over 4 days. We create unique moments with the support of world-renowned football teams, hotel chains and nightclubs. 

Probably the most remarkable characteristic of our team is that we truly care about our passions. We care about football, about organising events, about travelling, about celebrating with friends and about sharing these passions with like minded people. This spirit is the driving force behind our daily work at CeleBreak, and this spirit is what has prompted us to organise the CeleBreak tournament a friendly, relaxed and football inspired event that helps us all network and celebrate our summer break! 


CELEBREAK 2016

The upcoming CeleBreak Edition will take place during the month of June 2016. We have partnered with FC Barcelona & Real Madrid to use their training facilities for the football tournaments. The CeleBreak experience is broken down into 4 days which include , two parties at the most exclusive nightclub venues & a football tournament spanning over two days. (Day 1: Groups Stages & Day 2: Knockout Stages)

CeleBreak with Barca will occur during 23rd to 26th of June 2016

CeleBreak with Madrid will occur during the 30th June to 3rd July 2016

The experience is open to both men and women with a minimum age of 18. 



PRICING: 

Download our Customer Information Pack Here


The Impact

We have worked closely with all our partners to provide a value for money experience during the summer high-peak period. We want to create a new sport & nightlife tourism experience which is at the same time affordable for our participants. For us, it's all about the TRAVEL - PLAY - CELEBRATE

We recently organised our first edition with great success and look to using this platform to reach out to everyone who maybe interested. We have many photos and videos of CeleBreak 2015 on our social media which is easily available!


Risks & Challenges

Our biggest risk at hand is not having enough football teams to participate. Last year due to developing the concept and organising it three months before event day, we couldn't spread the word far enough about our awesome tournament! Fortunately, we had a great support from our local community and football family who helped complete the remaining slots. 

 This time we want to make sure everyone knows they can get to play football in the same facilities used by professional footballers. We have begun our sales period 9 months in advance this time and therefore, we have enough time to gather all the teams required. 


Other Ways You Can Help:

Sponsorship

Why Sponsor CeleBreak? Well, CeleBreak gives you the opportunity to connect and engage customers on a wider spectrum. Our main target markets span wide from different ages, nationalities and professions. Therefore, our aim will be to market our packages on a broad spectrum of distribution points. We will look to link up with travel agencies, Amateur football league representatives and travel & sport media. 

You can present your brand, company and products to our participants, and meet potential clients and distribution channels face to face. Use our social media platforms and tournaments to demonstrate your services and products to over 400 potential partners and customers. No worries, we’ll work with you every step of the way; creating the very best conditions for forging lasting, meaningful connections with our participants. 

WE'D LOVE YOU- We’re dedicated to making you part of a truly great experience. That’s why we like to call our sponsors “partners”: we like to work together and offer everyone the most out of this event. 

For more information do get in contact with us! 

Download our Sponsorship Proposal here

story:
Shop23 is cruelty-free ,vegan , and 5-free of major toxins. We have reach our year mark, June 1, 2016, within that year Shop23 received much success. We are trying to raise money to embark on our new journey with Whole Food Market and HSN.
The money raise will be used to provide the high demand of polishes need for each business, packaging/distributing, and labor.

Shop23 ultimate goal is to create an community based brand that not only produce nail polish but also give back in return. 

Thank You so much for checking out my page!

Love,

Daija
