story:
Enjoy Nova Nordique...

We're fully invested in this project and now we're opening up a PRE-SALE event to the public!

 

We plan to help residents and tourists reinvigorate their bodies and minds by using our state-of-the-art luxury Nordic day spa and resort center on the waterfront in Halifax Regional Municipality, Nova Scotia (private setting located 30 minutes from Halifax, Nova Scotia).  With all the “busyness” that overwhelms our days, enjoy a weekly spa session at Nova Nordique and experience thermal cycles, hydrotherapy, massages, nail/hair services, fine/casual dining, fully stocked bar, complete relaxation, and electric vehicle chargers! Our funding Founders will experience our “Founders Cycle***” giving them lifetime benefits.  Let us Shock your System the Healthy Way! 

 

Spa Services

Thermal Therapy & Hydrotherapy:  4-hour Thermal Treatment Package.

Massage Therapy  - Deep Tissue with specialized muscle treatments.

All our massage therapists are licensed therapists and remain independent contractors to give them flexibility with their schedules. 

Nail Bar – Professional & Licensed Nail Technicians specializing in gels, acrylics, and nail art.

Hair Salon – Licensed Hair Stylists specializing in organic color methods; Blow Dry Bar; Modern Haircuts with luxurious quality.

“Founders Cycle***”  - This hot/cold therapy cycle is a lifetime membership for FOUNDERS ONLY!  (See our Rewards!)  We want you to reap the benefits of becoming a Founding Partner.  Experience smaller, exclusive crowd sizes while meeting the owners, the staff, and other founding partners. 

Restaurant & Bar Services – Our Executive Chefs will not disappoint! 

Onsite Luxury Cabins -  We will house 10-15 guests each night in our onsite luxury cabins perfect for Girls “Weekend” Trips, Business Team Building Activities, honeymoons, and sports teams.

 

Benefits

*Located directly on the water to provide serenity and calm with our amazing views

*Luxury facility with mixed amenities derived from world-wide spa concepts 

*Convenient for business meetings/conferences

*Health and Relaxation to better the lives of all guests

*Get treated like family (i.e., Over the Top customer service)

 

Features

*Host up to 300 customers per day for thermal spa treatments

*Wellness, spa, and hospitality facility

*Overnight accommodations for 10-15 guests

*On-site Restaurant/Bar

*Breathtaking Waterfront location

 

Statistics

Halifax Regional Municipality – Popular tourist destination among residents of North America and Europe

30,000 = Canadian businesses focusing on modest day spa services

71,000 = People employed in the spa therapy industry

440,000 = Population of the Halifax region

1.5 Million = Nightly Rentals within the Halifax region

4 Million = Number of tourists in Halifax each year

$4 Billion = Revenue in Canada from Spas & Wellness Centers

 

Give Back

We are passionate about sustainable water-use practices and will donate 10% of our annual net profits to Swarovski Water School organization that specializes in providing safe water for everyone. (http://www.swarovskiwaterschool.com/ )

 

Meet the Team

Geoff Coderre &  Veronika MacDonald – Geoff and Veronika bring their love and passion of community, customer service, and travel to the Halifax region. Together, they have traveled to over 34 countries while visiting different Nordic spas along with way. Geoff and Veronika had an elaborate wedding planned in Toronto, but cancelled their wedding and decided to elope and sell their house in order to put up the initial investment for Nova Nordique. Geoff Coderre is a partial owner of family-based AKME Appraisals INC and has started several successful companies.  Veronika MacDonald has several years experience serving and in the banking industry as well.

John Mayo and Leanne Wiese share their commitment to the fitness industry.  They practice and are proponents of yoga, meditation, movement, and hot/cold therapy.  John Mayo is the founder of Mayo Bros Calisthenics, he grew their Instagram following to above 53,000 followers and converted this into a successful online coaching platform.  Leanne Wiese is the founder Wiese Moves, whereby she successfully offers in-home personal training and coaching to  clients throughout Halifax.

 

 

Sales & Marketing:  Social Media, Luxury Magazines, Direct Mail & Print, Influencers, Travel Agencies

Social media including Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Twitter, and Linked In. Check us out @novanordique

 

We will begin our sales and marketing efforts online using social media ad campaigns targeting local regions in Canada and the US.  After successful regional roll-outs, we will market to all of Canada and the US Northeast.  During this time we plan to build funnels between our Nova Nordique website, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube to acquire a strong brand affinity in the Halifax market area.

 

In addition to social platforms, we plan to partner with a marketing and public relations firm to create visibility and awareness of the luxury Nova Nordique Facility in Halifax Regional Municipality.  We will have articles in business, travel, and lifestyle magazines featuring Nova Nordique as a premium spa, wellness, and hospitality facility. Due to the specific branding of Nova Nordique, we feel that outsourcing this task will be the most effective means of leveraging our branding identity.

 

Local Marketing consists of direct mail, advertisements, ads in social media, and networking.  We believe in the community and look forward to positively contributing the local economy. 

 

We plan to allocate a large portion of the marketing funds to social ad campaigns beginning locally, then expanding nationwide.  Also, we are partnering with social media influencers to showcase their experience with their online following through Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube.  We feel this is a high impact with a low-cost method that will create excitement about Nova Nordique. 

 

We plan to allocate a large portion of the marketing funds to social ad campaigns beginning locally and expanding internationally within the first six months.

 

Lastly, we plan to partner with Travel Agencies, Cruise Ship Companies, and Airlines for layovers.  We will be offering these agencies a percentage commission.

 

Organizational Plan

Senior Management  (We are fun, creative, and determined.);

Center Manager (Organized beyond belief and fabulous with People.);

Administrative Manager (Organized, detail-oriented, and always smiling!);

Customer Service Staff (Upbeat, fun, and friendly.);

Facility Maintenance Staff (Gregarious, detail-oriented, and committed.);

Restaurant/Bar Staff (Customer Service like you have NEVER seen!);

Accountant (Yep, you guessed it…total numbers guru and detail-oriented.);

Administrative Staff (friendly, team players, and committed.). 

Legal and Marketing Staff:  We will outsource our marketing and legal departments with firms specializing in the luxury spa, wellness, and hospitality facilities space. 

 

SWOT Analysis

              Strengths

  • Efficient back-office support for managing day-to-day accounting and operational procedures
  • High gross margins
  • Low setup up costs for new spa services within our infrastructure
  • Experienced, Determined, and Organized Founders
  • Stunning location – on the water in Halifax Regional Municipality, Nova Scotia
  • Limited competition in the Nova Scotia target market
  • High barriers to entry

              Weaknesses

  • Fluctuating market conditions may impact revenue
  • High operating expenses

              Opportunities

  • Expansion into luxury spa and wellness industry
  • Development of additional locations across Canada (and US / Europe?)

              Threats

  • Regulatory issues increase each year
  • Onsite injury

 

Funding Allocation

We are asking for $600,000 (of $4,000,000) to secure land and begin facility development. Allocation of total funds consists of  70% Land and Facility Development; 5% Sales & Marketing; 15% Furniture, Fixtures, & Equipment; and 10% working capital, professional fees/licensing.  We are conscientious of every dollar we receive and will be diligent and mindful of our spending.  Thank you in advance for your contribution!  Enjoy the Rewards.  Relax. Refine. Reinvigorate.   Breathe.

 

Risks & Challenges

There are always risks and challenges when starting any new business; however, we feel confident that our risk is low to moderate in all areas of the company.  There is a low valuation risk for our investors due to funds invested in real estate and tangible FF&E.  Also, our business operates with competitive and lucrative margins.  Of course, securing capital sought to obtain property in the Halifax Regional Municipality comes with moderate risk, as well as ongoing marketing necessary to drive customers to our area.  Check out our perks!

 

This is NOT a fundraising campaign! It is an exclusive 'pre-sale' event.

 

Blue Lagoon Draw Entries

-Shout Out And Thank You = 1 draw entry

-Nova Sampler = 2 draw entries

-Early Bird (2 weeks only) = 3 draw entries

-Founders Package = 4 draw entries

-Spa A-While = 5 draw entries

-Exclusive One-Year Membership = 6 draw entries

-Cut The Ribbon = 8 draw entries

-Exclusive Plunge Package = 10 draw entries

 

Thank you!

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for sharing our passion (a haven of health and relaxation) …and reading this far into the campaign!  Yippee!

 

Together we can give YOU and other busy individuals a state-of-the-art luxury experience while helping them experience the profound health benefits of hot and cold contrast therapy.  Please share our campaign on your favourite social media platforms!
story_txt:
Enjoy Nova Nordique...
We're fully invested in this project and now we're opening up a PRE-SALE event to the public!
 
We plan to help residents and tourists reinvigorate their bodies and minds by using our state-of-the-art luxury Nordic day spa and resort center on the waterfront in Halifax Regional Municipality, Nova Scotia (private setting located 30 minutes from Halifax, Nova Scotia).  With all the “busyness” that overwhelms our days, enjoy a weekly spa session at Nova Nordique and experience thermal cycles, hydrotherapy, massages, nail/hair services, fine/casual dining, fully stocked bar, complete relaxation, and electric vehicle chargers! Our funding Founders will experience our “Founders Cycle***” giving them lifetime benefits.  Let us Shock your System the Healthy Way! 
 
Spa Services 
Thermal Therapy & Hydrotherapy:  4-hour Thermal Treatment Package.
Massage Therapy  - Deep Tissue with specialized muscle treatments.
All our massage therapists are licensed therapists and remain independent contractors to give them flexibility with their schedules. 
Nail Bar – Professional & Licensed Nail Technicians specializing in gels, acrylics, and nail art.
Hair Salon – Licensed Hair Stylists specializing in organic color methods; Blow Dry Bar; Modern Haircuts with luxurious quality.
“Founders Cycle***”  - This hot/cold therapy cycle is a lifetime membership for FOUNDERS ONLY!  (See our Rewards!)  We want you to reap the benefits of becoming a Founding Partner.  Experience smaller, exclusive crowd sizes while meeting the owners, the staff, and other founding partners. 
Restaurant & Bar Services – Our Executive Chefs will not disappoint! 
Onsite Luxury Cabins -  We will house 10-15 guests each night in our onsite luxury cabins perfect for Girls “Weekend” Trips, Business Team Building Activities, honeymoons, and sports teams.
 
Benefits
*Located directly on the water to provide serenity and calm with our amazing views
*Luxury facility with mixed amenities derived from world-wide spa concepts 
*Convenient for business meetings/conferences
*Health and Relaxation to better the lives of all guests
*Get treated like family (i.e., Over the Top customer service)
 
Features
*Host up to 300 customers per day for thermal spa treatments
*Wellness, spa, and hospitality facility
*Overnight accommodations for 10-15 guests
*On-site Restaurant/Bar
*Breathtaking Waterfront location
 
Statistics
Halifax Regional Municipality – Popular tourist destination among residents of North America and Europe
30,000 = Canadian businesses focusing on modest day spa services
71,000 = People employed in the spa therapy industry
440,000 = Population of the Halifax region
1.5 Million = Nightly Rentals within the Halifax region
4 Million = Number of tourists in Halifax each year
$4 Billion = Revenue in Canada from Spas & Wellness Centers
 
Give Back
We are passionate about sustainable water-use practices and will donate 10% of our annual net profits to Swarovski Water School organization that specializes in providing safe water for everyone. (http://www.swarovskiwaterschool.com/ )
 
Meet the Team 
Geoff Coderre &  Veronika MacDonald – Geoff and Veronika bring their love and passion of community, customer service, and travel to the Halifax region. Together, they have traveled to over 34 countries while visiting different Nordic spas along with way. Geoff and Veronika had an elaborate wedding planned in Toronto, but cancelled their wedding and decided to elope and sell their house in order to put up the initial investment for Nova Nordique. Geoff Coderre is a partial owner of family-based AKME Appraisals INC and has started several successful companies.  Veronika MacDonald has several years experience serving and in the banking industry as well.
John Mayo and Leanne Wiese share their commitment to the fitness industry.  They practice and are proponents of yoga, meditation, movement, and hot/cold therapy.  John Mayo is the founder of Mayo Bros Calisthenics, he grew their Instagram following to above 53,000 followers and converted this into a successful online coaching platform.  Leanne Wiese is the founder Wiese Moves, whereby she successfully offers in-home personal training and coaching to  clients throughout Halifax.
 
 
Sales & Marketing:  Social Media, Luxury Magazines, Direct Mail & Print, Influencers, Travel Agencies
Social media including Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Twitter, and Linked In. Check us out @novanordique
 
We will begin our sales and marketing efforts online using social media ad campaigns targeting local regions in Canada and the US.  After successful regional roll-outs, we will market to all of Canada and the US Northeast.  During this time we plan to build funnels between our Nova Nordique website, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube to acquire a strong brand affinity in the Halifax market area.
 
In addition to social platforms, we plan to partner with a marketing and public relations firm to create visibility and awareness of the luxury Nova Nordique Facility in Halifax Regional Municipality.  We will have articles in business, travel, and lifestyle magazines featuring Nova Nordique as a premium spa, wellness, and hospitality facility. Due to the specific branding of Nova Nordique, we feel that outsourcing this task will be the most effective means of leveraging our branding identity.
 
Local Marketing consists of direct mail, advertisements, ads in social media, and networking.  We believe in the community and look forward to positively contributing the local economy. 
 
We plan to allocate a large portion of the marketing funds to social ad campaigns beginning locally, then expanding nationwide.  Also, we are partnering with social media influencers to showcase their experience with their online following through Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube.  We feel this is a high impact with a low-cost method that will create excitement about Nova Nordique. 
 
We plan to allocate a large portion of the marketing funds to social ad campaigns beginning locally and expanding internationally within the first six months.
 
Lastly, we plan to partner with Travel Agencies, Cruise Ship Companies, and Airlines for layovers.  We will be offering these agencies a percentage commission.
 
Organizational Plan
Senior Management  (We are fun, creative, and determined.);
Center Manager (Organized beyond belief and fabulous with People.);
Administrative Manager (Organized, detail-oriented, and always smiling!);
Customer Service Staff (Upbeat, fun, and friendly.);
Facility Maintenance Staff (Gregarious, detail-oriented, and committed.);
Restaurant/Bar Staff (Customer Service like you have NEVER seen!);
Accountant (Yep, you guessed it…total numbers guru and detail-oriented.);
Administrative Staff (friendly, team players, and committed.). 
Legal and Marketing Staff:  We will outsource our marketing and legal departments with firms specializing in the luxury spa, wellness, and hospitality facilities space. 
 
SWOT Analysis
              Strengths

Efficient back-office support for managing day-to-day accounting and operational procedures
High gross margins
Low setup up costs for new spa services within our infrastructure
Experienced, Determined, and Organized Founders
Stunning location – on the water in Halifax Regional Municipality, Nova Scotia
Limited competition in the Nova Scotia target market
High barriers to entry

              Weaknesses

Fluctuating market conditions may impact revenue
High operating expenses

              Opportunities

Expansion into luxury spa and wellness industry
Development of additional locations across Canada (and US / Europe?)

              Threats

Regulatory issues increase each year
Onsite injury

 
Funding Allocation
We are asking for $600,000 (of $4,000,000) to secure land and begin facility development. Allocation of total funds consists of  70% Land and Facility Development; 5% Sales & Marketing; 15% Furniture, Fixtures, & Equipment; and 10% working capital, professional fees/licensing.  We are conscientious of every dollar we receive and will be diligent and mindful of our spending.  Thank you in advance for your contribution!  Enjoy the Rewards.  Relax. Refine. Reinvigorate.   Breathe.
 
Risks & Challenges
There are always risks and challenges when starting any new business; however, we feel confident that our risk is low to moderate in all areas of the company.  There is a low valuation risk for our investors due to funds invested in real estate and tangible FF&E.  Also, our business operates with competitive and lucrative margins.  Of course, securing capital sought to obtain property in the Halifax Regional Municipality comes with moderate risk, as well as ongoing marketing necessary to drive customers to our area.  Check out our perks!
 
This is NOT a fundraising campaign! It is an exclusive 'pre-sale' event.
 
Blue Lagoon Draw Entries
-Shout Out And Thank You = 1 draw entry
-Nova Sampler = 2 draw entries
-Early Bird (2 weeks only) = 3 draw entries
-Founders Package = 4 draw entries
-Spa A-While = 5 draw entries
-Exclusive One-Year Membership = 6 draw entries
-Cut The Ribbon = 8 draw entries
-Exclusive Plunge Package = 10 draw entries
 
Thank you!
Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for sharing our passion (a haven of health and relaxation) …and reading this far into the campaign!  Yippee!
 
Together we can give YOU and other busy individuals a state-of-the-art luxury experience while helping them experience the profound health benefits of hot and cold contrast therapy.  Please share our campaign on your favourite social media platforms!

story:
Maneuverable and customisable

The ERIDA drone constantly tracks where you are and follows you automatically keeping the camera on you and captures your every move.

We set out to create the best aerial photography experience you ever imagined. This means the creation of a powerful drone to provide smooth, stable flight dynamics from the moment it takes off. Our drone is also a smart one: it manages the flight in a way that you can retake creative control and focus on getting great videos. People really want great shots and they wish to take them without professional tools. ERIDA enables them to get fabulous videos easily without the need to spend years getting trained as a professional drone pilot.

The ERIDA drone has a wide range of features, from manual flight and camera telemetric controls to fully automatic takeoff, flight and landing. Enjoy filming with ERIDA!



READ MIKESHOUTS ARTICLE

READ TECHCO ARTICLE

READ GIZMAG ARTICLE


ERIDA Gen.A video



The control of the apparatus has never been so simple!





















Special Thanks:


Alexia Gruver

Natalia Us

Tsaplina Svitlana

Randhir


Each of us admires beautiful videos shot from the air. Such videos made by Red Bull or GoPro are really breathtaking. One day we decided we had to get our own video: of ourselves and of the landscapes we see in our trips. We were planning a trip to the mountains and thought it would be great to return home with a nice video of our travel. We chose to go to a mountain region about 3600 m high. We knew that in the mountains we will face wind and even snow. That’s why we wanted to find a fully autonomous drone, compact enough to be packed in a bag and easily portable, but, at the same time, to be able to work at high altitudes in conditions of low temperatures and strong wind, moving at a speed up to 90 km/h. We were unable to find such a drone and… set out to build a copter meeting all our requirements. Model-makers know too well that at low temperatures batteries either fail immediately or run down very quickly. At the height of 4000 m the atmospheric density is 40% lower that at the sea level. All the above made our goal an engineering challenge. Having vast experience in designing aerospace apparatuses, we chose the way similar to building big planes. After some research we got the target weight of the structure. In order to provide the required weight and durability of the drone we decided to use carbon fabric as the strongest and the lightest material. We built two prototypes. The first one was used to test and choose the necessary equipment; the second one was intended for testing software and flight modes. Simultaneously, we were building our first Atlas ERIDA Gen.A copter. The copter’s design was not just aesthetic, it also helped to reduce air pressure. The camera mounted on the stabilized platform allows to get a video closely approximated to a professional footage. The wind may cause failures of the height sensor, that is why we installed a LIDAR thus enhancing the copter’s movement precision and safety which is vital when shooting in crowded places. To further improve the copter’s safety one can upload maps enabling it to avoid dangerous areas and recognize the location of buildings and other structures. When the tests and trials were successfully completed we packed our creation and took it to the mountains with us. After our trip we realized that we had created a truly worthy apparatus and considered it our duty to share our achievement with others. We slightly changed the design, solved the problems which came out during the usage of the first version and also made some general improvements. We did our best to enable any person, even without any piloting experience, to shoot with ease and get a beautiful footage of his/her activities.


Okay, so as we all know... carbon materials are expensive, and extremely complex when it comes to production. But thank goodness, we have great experience in this, and know how to create a cost-effective solution.

We have built test models and prototypes…And have successfully tested them. Now, to begin production… That's where you come in! First off, the molds are very expensive to produce.

Therefore, only a specific number of your orders will help to reduce the price, and put this awesome product into your hands as quickly as possible. We also need money to finish the development of the app, and fix all bugs. 

So as a young company, being able to use the revenue from your pre-order to pay for things as we build them, helps us to reduce risk, and also helps to ensure that we deliver the best possible product . 

The more orders we are able to receive, the faster and cheaper we will be able to put the product out there. Only you and your interest can help make this amazing project a reality… and make it available for everyone.
